Aimee is a 26-year-old married woman from Ubay, Bohol, and she is the mother of a 5-year-old child. She has been engaged in a farming business for more than 5 years now. This is the source of her income. She is also engaged in a sari-sari or variety store.

She is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer for the farm and additional stock to sell, like canned goods, noodles, biscuits, soda and toiletries. With this, she will be able to improve her business, thus augmenting her sales and income. Aimee dreams of expanding her business and saves money for the future schooling of her child.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for the farm and additional stock to sell, like canned goods, noodles, biscuits, soda and toiletries.

loans.name: Aseel

texts.en: Aseel is a 23-year-old conservative young lady, so she asked her mother, for whose business she is taking out this loan, to appear in the photo instead of her. Aseel is a single lady who has five younger brothers. She is a university student who wants to support her mother in her home business making clothing items. She is applying for this youth loan to bring in more thread and new sewing tools to support her mother's tailoring business.

loans.use: to bring in more thread and new sewing tools

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses lives in Butere, a small town in Kakamega county. Kakamega county is located in Western Kenya, close to the Ugandan border. It contains the only tropical rain forest in Kenya, and the variety of the flora in the region makes it well suited for beekeeping. It has one of the highest rural population densities in the world (in some areas, close to 600 people per square kilometer), which may contribute to the region's high poverty rates.

Moses is married, and has three children. He and his wife both farm, and they are currently growing maize on their land. He is excited to start beekeeping because it is a profitable activity that does not require much investment, and he is looking forward to working with Honey Care because he trusts the Hive Technicians to visit his farm regularly and do good work repairing the hives and harvesting honey.

This is Moses' first loan, and he plans to use the income generated from his hives to help pay school fees for his sister's children. In the future, Moses hopes to become a businessman.

loans.use: to buy beehives for honey production.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is a 45-year-old married mother of four children. To make a living, she makes and sells food. She has been in this business for four months and earns about 3,000 PHP a month doing so.

She is requesting an 8,000 PHP loan that she will use to buy the ingredients needed to make the food she sells.

loans.use: to buy  ingredients needed to make the food she sells.

loans.name: Fallah

texts.en:
Fallah is an Iraqi married client, who is 31 years old and has two children. Fallah is the only provider in his family. He is a grocer, and he has been in this field ever since he was a child. He sells all the basic needs of a household such as canned food, juices, soft drinks, snacks, detergents and shampoos. 

In 2007, Fallah established his own business and gained good experience and an excellent reputation in his surrounding area.

Fallah is requesting a loan of 3,000 USD. He will use this loan to install a new ceiling and to buy a new motor generator for his grocery store. He aims to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to educate his children and provide them a bright future.

loans.use: to install a new ceiling and to buy a new motor generator for his grocery store

loans.name: Mayra Del Socorro

texts.es:
Santa Rosa del Peñón una bella ciudad ubicada a 90 Km del departamento de León, donde existen diferentes tipos de actividades comerciales.  

Mayra del Socorro se llama la Joven de 37 años de edad donde habita con sus tres hijos a su cargo, su esposo trabaja de albañil, con lo poco que el gana a duras pena ajusta con los gastos de alimentación de su hogar, pero son de sus sueños darle un repello a las paredes de su casa para una mejor seguridad en su familia.   
 
Ella se dedica brindar servicio en uno de los centros de salud, hoy en día se dio cuenta que Ceprodel Y Kiva piensa en el desarrollo de las personas emprendedoras como es el caso de esta joven, de tal forma le está solicitando que le brinden un financiamiento, para la compra de: cemento y arena y pago de Mano de Obra. 

Esto sería de mucho beneficio después de un día cansado de su labor llegar feliz mente a su viviendita reunidos con su familia viviendo en mejores condiciones. 

Hoy en día Agradece a KIVA y Ceprodel por el apoyo con estos pequeños créditos que ayudara a mejorar las condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Santa Rosa del Peñón is a beautiful city situated 90 km from the district of León, where many different types of commercial activity exist. 

Mayra del Socorro is 37 years old and has three children. Her husband works as a builder but with the little that he earns, they only just manage to pay for food. Their dream, however, is to plaster the walls of their house so that their family is more secure. 
 
She works in a health centre. Recently she realised that Ceprodel and Kiva look to develop entrepreneurial people like her. Therefore, she is requesting finance to buy: cement, sand and labour cost.

It would be great for her, after a tiring day at work, to arrive happily to her home reunited with her family to live in better conditions.

She wants to thank KIVA and Ceprodel for their help in providing small loans that help to improve people's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand.

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida is a 43-year-old married woman from Ubay, Bohol. She has five children. The eldest is 22 and the youngest is 7 years old. She is engaged in a fishing business. She sells fish in her local area. She has been in this business for 6 years now together with her husband. This is the source of her income.
 
She is requesting a loan to buy fishhooks, lead weights and nylon string. These materials will be used in fishing. With the aid of the loan, she will be able to buy these materials to help her business. In the future, Aida hopes to expand her business. She also wishes to have another business to supplement the needs of her family and to have a bigger boat to be used in fishing.

loans.use: to buy fishhooks, lead weights and nylon string.

loans.name: Arceli

texts.en:
Arceli is a 28-year-old married woman from Ubay, Bohol. She has three children. The oldest is four years old and the youngest is 11 months old. Arceli has been  engaged in a farming business. She also has a second business which is food vending. This will help to supplement her income to cover other needs of the family.  She has been in this business for three years now.  Her husband is a farmer. 

Arceli is requesting a loan to buy oil, flour, and sugar. These ingredients are used in her food vending business. By the help of this loan, she will be able to buy these ingredients to start making food for her business so she can sell it to her local community. 

In the future, Arceli hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy  oil, flour, and sugar

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria, 54, is from San Pablo and currently lives in Guminga. She is a married mother of five children and she works as a merchant who makes and sells 'kakanin' ( sweet rice with coconut). She has owned her business for over twenty years. 

She started her work by helping her mother. It was there that she gained experience and a full understanding of the business. Once she came of age, she decided to keep going in the same line of work because it generated a lot of profit on a daily basis. 

This has been her first business which she runs with her husband. She sells her products in the nearby neighborhoods where she lives. She is requesting the loan to buy firewood, sugar, coconuts and banana leaves. All of the ingredients are needed for cooking and to give the 'kakanin' flavor.

The loan will help her a lot since she will be able to invest more in her inventory, increasing her production.

loans.use: to buy firewood, sugar, coconuts and banana leaves.

loans.name: Merlita

texts.en:
Merlita, 50 years old and still single, operates a mini-eatery and 'sari-sari' store. She has been an entrepreneur for several years and has the sales experience necessary to increase her profits. She has regular customers because she is friendly and a very good woman. Customers prefer to go to her because she always has their requests and her food is delectable and yet affordable. 

Merlita works very hard each day to achieve success. Like every good merchant, she wants to grow her business and promote new investment. She needs capital to do so and has requested a loan in the amount of Php 40,000 to buy groceries, meat, rice and vegetables. She makes sure that these inputs will produce higher sales that certainly will help her repay the loan while saving for a new business and helping her siblings and nephews have a better life.

loans.use: to buy groceries, meat, rice and vegetables

loans.name: Haitham

texts.en:
Haitham is from Iraq. He is 35 years old, married and has three children. Haitham works hard to provide his family income while his wife takes care of their children.

Haitham is a grocer. He sells canned foods, olives, pickles and detergents.  He has been providing his living through practicing this business since 2000 and has gained good experience. Haitham has gained an excellent reputation in his surrounding area.

Haitham is requesting a sum of 3,000 USD to install a rolling shutter and to buy a motor generator and an air conditioner.  He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so that someday he may open a big supermarket and offer more service to his neighborhood.

loans.use: to install a rolling shutter and to buy a motor generator and an air conditioner

loans.name: Abadahemana Group

texts.fr:
Séraphine fait partie du groupe Abadahemana et  habite à  Gitega. Elle a 43 ans et est mariée  à Joseph, un commerçant. Ensemble ils ont 3 enfants dont l’un étudie.

Elle fait le commerce de beignets depuis 6 ans. 

Elle est à son seizième crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle  obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de beignets  à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Grâce aux bénéfices, elle assure les besoins fondamentaux de la famille (alimentation, logement, et les soins de santé).
texts.en:
Séraphine is a member of the Abadahemana Group and lives in Gitega. She is 43 years old and is married to Joseph, a merchant. Together they have three children, one of whom attends school.

Séraphine has been selling beignets for  the past six years and is on her sixteenth loan cycle with Turame. With the loan she receives from KIVA, Séraphine plans to increase her capital by purchasing a large number of donuts that she will resell to earn more income. The income she earns will enable Séraphine to provide for the basic needs of her family (food, housing, and health care).

loans.use: to purchase a large number of donuts that she will resell to earn more income.

loans.name: Cinthya Alexandra

texts.es:
La Clienta Cinthia vive en La Libertad, ella tiene 25 años de edad. Ella nos cuenta que hace ya un tiempo que lleva  vendiendo productos AVON y ropa por catalogo, a sus amistades y vecinos y por medio de esta labor se puede mantener ella en su hogar.

Ella realiza su labor sola, y lo hace durante el día. Ella no está casada, ni tiene hijos.

Usara el préstamo para trabajar con la venta de ropa por catalogo, y productos AVON y asi mejorar sus ventas.
 Ella desea que su negocio se mantenga porque es su único sustento.
texts.en:
Cinthia is 25 years old and lives in La Libertad. She says that she has been selling Avon products and clothing through catalogs to her friends and neighbors for some time. Working in this manner enables her to maintain her household.

Cinthia works alone throughout the day. She is not married and has no children. Cinthia will use this loan for her work so that she can sell Avon products and clothing through catalogs, thus improving her sales. Her wish for her business is to maintain it since it is her only source of income.

loans.use: to buy Avon products and clothing to sell.

loans.name: Donald De Los Angeles

texts.es: El señor Donald habita en el Km 10 1/2  carretera Masaya, junto a su esposa e hijos, trabaja como conductor en una casa privada, actualmente el señor Donald necesita realizar una modificaciones en su casa ya que le urge terminar un cuarto para uno de sus hijos ya que requieren de privaidad y de algunos espacios, con este Financiamiento comprara Puertas, Cemento, Arena, Bloques para terminarlo, Agradece el apoyo que Afodenic y Fondos Kiva le han brindado con esta nueva oportunidad.
texts.en: Donald lives in the 10 ½ km part of Masaya road, along with his wife and children.  He works as a driver in a private home.  Donald needs to make some modifications to his home because he must finish a room for one of his children who need privacy and space.  He will use the money from this loan to buy doors, cement, sand, and cinder blocks to complete it.  He is grateful for Afodenic’s support and Kiva funds.  They have provided him a new opportunity.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Narissa

texts.en:
Narissa is a helpful wife and mother to her family. She is 39 years old. Her spouse is a tricycle driver and supports the family, especially education fees for their children. She helps her spouse earn income by raising hogs to sell when they are grown.

Now, she hopes to improve the income of her spouse's business and that is why she is asking for a loan of P50,000 to buy crude oil and gasoline for motorcycle maintenance and buy feed and medicines for her hogs.

This will help improve their income and as well providing safe travel for all their passengers.

Narissa hopes to keep improving their businesses for their children's education and as a legacy to them and so they can attain a progressive life someday.

loans.use: to buy crude oil and gasoline for motorcycle maintenance and buy feed and medicines for hogs

loans.name: Conchita

texts.en:
Conchita  is a married woman and a mother of six children from Ubay, Bohol. She has been engaged in a pig raising business for more than 10 years now and it is her main source of income. 

Conchita works hard to provide support to her husband in meeting the needs of the family, especially for the schooling of her children. She is asking for a loan to buy additional piglets to raise. With this, she will be able to improve her business and makes it a success.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets to raise

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 26 years old, married, and has two children. She lives in the Philippines and earns a living by fattening pigs. She has been in this business for nine years, and earns additional income from selling vegetables. She is borrowing 7,000 Philippines pesos (PHP), which she will use to purchase additional feed for her pigs.

Marilyn is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Destacadas Group

texts.es: El banco de emprendimiento DESTACADAS está compuesto por ocho integrantes, siete mujeres y un varón, la presidenta del banco es la Sra. Ana en la foto la del centro parada de blusa floreada) , ella se dedica a la venta de empanadas por las mañanas y en las tardes es ayudante de cocina, la Sra. Ana es una persona muy trabajadora  que con dedicación poco a poco va adquiriendo estabilidad y solvencia y también popularidad por que es muy conocida por sus clientes ella es una persona muy trabajadora ya que se dedica a dos actividades con el dinero del crédito comprara insumos para la elaboración de sus empanadas como harina y aceite, se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado a ella y a sus compañeras de grupo ya que son personas que trabajan mucho para salir adelante.
texts.en: The DESTACADAS communal bank is made up of eight members, seven women and one man. The bank president is Ana. In the photo she is the one standing in the middle with a flowered blouse. She sells empanadas in the morning and in the afternoon she is a kitchen assistant. Ana is a very hardworking person who with dedication has little by little acquired stability, solvency and popularity. She is very well known by her customers. She is a very hardworking person,  since she has two activities. With the money for the loan, she will buy ingredients to make empanadas, such as flour and oil. She is happy and grateful to the institution for the support it has given her and the other members of the group, because they are people who work very hard to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy materials to maker empanadas, such as flour and oil.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
Ana, de 53 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora ,está casada con Juan quien se dedica a la construcción civil, fruto de esa unión tuvieron 04 hijos .Vive en compañía de su pareja y 2 hijos en la casa que compro con mucho esfuerzo.La actividad que realiza Ana, es la venta de abarrotes de primera necesidad, pescados frescos y plátanos, para eso instala todos los días muy temprano una mesa en el frontis de su casa, atendiendo con sus productos a sus clientes que en su mayoría son sus propios vecinos, logrando tener muchos clientes.
Se inicio  hace más de 20 años con un capital propio y luego fue creciendo.Le gusta su negocio pues le permite tener un ingreso económico para solventar sus gastos,  así como el poder conocer otros lugares y nuevas personas  además de ver crecer su negocio a base de su esfuerzo. No le gusta cuando llueve muy constantemente ya que dificulta el libre transito de las personas malogrando los accesos a su casa . Por tanto, se da fuerzas para hacer crecer su negocio.Este será el préstamo número 06 con Kiva,  por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos .Con el monto solicitado de S.800 soles comprará productos comestibles , asi como pescados y plátanos ya que tienen precios cómodos.
texts.en:
Ana is 53 years old. She is a hardworking woman and is married to Juan, who works in civil construction. They have four children together. She lives with her husband and with two of their children in the house they bought with a lot of hard work. Ana's activities is selling basic necessity groceries, fresh fish and plantains. That is why she sets up a table every day early in front of her. She sells her products to her customers who are mostly her neighbors. She has a lot of customers.

She started more than 20 years ago with her own capital and then it grew. She likes her business because it allows her to have income to pay her expenses and see different places and meet new people and watch her business grow from her hard work. She doesn't like it when it rains all the time because it makes it difficult for people to get around and access her house. This will be loan number 6 with Kiva, and she hopes to have your cooperation to continue with her goals. With the amount she has asked for of S.800 soles, she will buy food products as well as fish and plantains, since they are at a good price.

loans.use: to buy food products, fish, and more.

loans.name: Angel Ricardo

texts.es:
ANGEL tiene 33 años de edad es casado tiene cuatro hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos en Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar.

Es Integrante de la VRC ALLY ÑAN esta conformada por 10 socios que son de la misma comunidad, esta ubicada a 20 minutos de la oficina.

ANGEL se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, habasm alverja, además se dedica a la crianza de pollos y aserrar madera.

Solicita el crédito para comprar urea, fertilizantes, insecticidas, herbicidas. Con la ayuda del crédito podra comprar lo necesario para la agricultura. 

Las compras las realizará en la ciudad de Guaranda. El sueño es comprar un lote de terreno. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es que los hijos sean profesionales. En el timpo libre le gusta realizar deporte en especial el futbool.
texts.en:
ANGEL is 33 years old. He is married and has four children. He lives with his wife and children in Guaranda, province of Bolívar.

He is a member of the ALLY ÑAN communal bank, made up 10 members who are from the same community. It is located 20 minutes from the office. 

ANGEL is a farmer. He grows corn, beans, peas, and also raises chickens and cuts lumber.

He is asking for the loan to buy urea, fertilizer, insecticide and herbicide. With the help from the loan, he will be able to buy what he needs for farmers.  

He makes his purchases in the city of Guaranda. His dream is to buy a plot of land. The challenges he faces are getting his children college education. In his free time, he likes to play sports, especially football.

loans.use: to buy urea, fertilizers, insecticides, and herbicides

loans.name: Firuza

texts.ru: Фируза молодая незамужняя девушка. Ей 24 года. Она вместе с родителями живет в городе Дангаре в юго-восточной части Таджикистана. Фируза имеет среднее образование. Она независимая и самостоятельная. Фируза с 18 лет начала работать в сфере торговли. В городе у ее отца есть собственный магазин, где она вместе с ним занимается торговлей. В основном Фируза продает продукты питания, в том числе: конфеты, печенье, чай, напитки и т.д.  Кредит берет для закупа ассортимента товаров (продуктов питания), чтобы увеличить товарооборот и расширить бизнес.
texts.en: Firuza is a young single woman. She is 24 years old. She lives with her parents in the town of Dangara in the Southwest of Tajikistan. Firuza has finished secondary school. She is independent and self-reliant. From the age of 18, Firuza has started working in retail. Her father owns a store in town, where she works together with him. Firuza mainly sells groceries,  such as candy, cookies, tea, beverages etc. She is taking out a loan to stock up on goods (groceries) in order to increase her sales volume and expand her business.

loans.use: to stock up on goods (groceries).

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene is a 28-year-old woman from Garcia, Bohol. She has one child, a 2-year-old son. She is engaged in a fishing business. She has been in this business for five years now. This is the source of her income.

Arlene is requesting a loan to buy fish net, lead weights, floaters, and fish hooks. These materials are used in fishing. With the help of this loan, she will be able to buy these materials so she can start her own business. In the future, Arlene hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fish net, lead weights, floaters, and fish hooks

loans.name: Mrwan

texts.en: Mrwan is 25-year-old married man who lives in Ibb, Yemen. He has been operating a barber shop for three years. He is a hardworking man who provides his family with a better life. He offers good services for his clients. He would like to stock his business with more products, so he has applied for a youth loan of 100,000 YER from AMB. He will use the loan to buy barber materials to continue to increase his profit. He hopes to expand his business so that he can buy a car and own a house. He appreciated Kiva for financing the first loan, and he hopes to be funded for this loan.

loans.use: to buy barber materials

loans.name: Angel Carlos

texts.es:
ANGEL tiene 35 años de edad es casado, vive con la esposa y los hijos en la ciudad de Gauaranda provincia de Bolívar.

Es Integrante de la VRC ALLY ÑAN esta conformada por 10 socios que son de la misma comunidad, esta ubicada a 20 minutos de la oficina.

ANGEL se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, habas alverja, además se dedica a la crianza de pollos y cerdos.

Solicita el crédito para comprar urea, fertilizantes, insecticidas, herbicidas. Con la ayuda del crédito podra comprar lo necesario para la agricultura. 

Las compras las realizará en la ciudad de Guaranda. El sueño es comprar más animales. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas en las siembras. En el tiempo libre le gusta pasar con los hijos.
texts.en:
Angel is 35 years old and is married. He lives with his wife and children in the city of Guaranda, in the province of Bolívar.  He is a member of the VRC ALLY ÑAN group that is made up of 10 partners that all hail from the same community, which is located 20 minutes away from the office.  

Angel works in agriculture, planting corn, peas, beans, as well as raising chickens and pigs.  He is requesting this loan to buy urea, fertilizers, insecticides, and herbicides.  With the help of this loan he will be able to buy the necessary materials for agriculture.  He will make his purchases in Guaranda.  His dream is to buy more animals.  The challenges he faces are the plagues that come with planting.  In his free time, he like to spend time with his children.

loans.use: to buy urea, fertilizers, insecticides, and herbicides.

loans.name: Orange Group

texts.en:
Kabeni, who is in his early 50s, is married and has five children: two boys and three girls. All of them are still attending school. For the past year, he has been earning a living by operating a Genge (fruits and vegetables) business. He works from 7:00 am to 9:00 pm daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be his twelfth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used his previous loans to increase his inventory and to start selling dry food in the same place. He sells items such as sugar, salt, beans, backing flour, wheat flour, cooking oil, etc. Now his business is called Genge Duka (fruits, vegetables, and the dry food in the same shop). He has managed to pay back all of his loans successfully. He will use this loan to increase his inventory of vegetables and fruits. His dream is to one day be able to own a big retail shop.

Kabeni will share this loan with his loan group "Orange," which has 11 members who hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase inventory of vegetables and fruits

loans.name: 08-Pt2-11-Phú Sơn 2 Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Diện works in agriculture, raising marine aquaculture. She is requesting a loan to purchase small fish to raise and to buy vegetables for resale. Diện has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Diện faces in her business is the lack of capital. This is Diện's first loan with Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women (FPW). She is the group leader of the 08-PT2-11-Phú Sơn2 solidarity group, which is comprised of five members, pictured above. 

Diện is 35 years old, and she is married and has four children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with four dependents. With her business profit, Diện hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to build a new house, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase small fish to raise and to buy vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Marcial

texts.es: El  Señor Marcial de 28 años de edad estado civil soltero, con una instrucción de nivel primario, vive en Colomi. Sr. Marcial trabaja como empleado en carpintería de su hermano realizando (puertas, ventanas, sillas, mesas, roperos, cómodas y todo mueble en general) con una experiencia de mas de 2 años, de esta forma se mantiene económicamente a través de su trabajo para su alimentación y en su vida diaria, el necesita un crédito para comprar terreno y así poder tener domicilio propio a futuro, por este motivo solicita un préstamo ya que él tiene un ahorro que fue ahorrando a través de los años y con el monto del préstamo sus sueño se hará realidad. Por ultimo Marcial se siente contento al tener la oportunidad de acceder a este crédito, además tendrá terreno propio y así poder ahorrar ya que tiene pensado construir su vivienda a futuro.
texts.en:
Marcial, 28, is single with a primary school education level. He lives in Colomi. Marcial works as an employee in his brother's carpentry shop making doors, windows, chairs, tables, closets, bureaus and all furniture in general, with more than two years of experience. He supports himself economically through his work, covering food and daily living.

He needs a loan in order to buy land so that he will be able to have his own home in the future. For this reason he is requesting a loan since he has savings that he has been saving up over the years, and together with the amount of the loan he will make his dream a reality. 

Finally, Marcial feels happy to have the opportunity to have access to this loan. He will also have his own land and that way he can save since he is thinking of building his home in the future.

loans.use: to buy land

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: Don Carlos, tiene 38 años de edad, su familia está compuesta por tres miembros el y los dos padres, es una familia humilde de escasos recursos económicos, viven en la comunidad de Kurumayu del municipio de Mizque, del departamento de Cochabamba. Trabaja en la agricultura y la pecuaria, produce cebolla, frejol y papa; los comercializa en el mismo lugar donde vive a los comerciantes de la misma población de Mizque. Don Carlos es una persona muy respetada en su comunidad, por la dedicación a su trabajo y por ser el responsable de la alimentación y la educación de su familia. Tienen una vivienda de paredes de adobe, techo de cañaweca y revoque de barro, esta clase de vivienda cada año antes de las lluvias hay que hacer el revoque, Don Carlos, está solicitando el presente crédito para comprar semillas, abonos y agroquímicos  y mejorar las condiciones de vida de toda su familia.
texts.en:
Mr. Carlos, who is 38 years old, lives together with his parents. His is a humble family with scarce economic resources. They live in the community of Kurumayu, in the municipality of Mizque, in the region of Cochabamba. He works in agriculture and livestock, and grows onions, beans and potatoes. He sells them to the businesses within the Mizque population.

Mr. Carlos is a well-respected person in his community, because he is so dedicated to his work and because he is responsible for feeding and educating his family. They have a home with adobe walls, a hollow-reed roof, and a dirt floor. This type of housing must be readied every year for the rainy season. 

Mr. Carlos is asking for this particular loan in order to buy seeds, fertilizers and other agrochemicals, as well as to improve the condition of his family's home.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and agrochemicals.

loans.name: Lenis

texts.es: EL SR. LENIS ES UNA PERSONA DE CONDICIÓN HUMILDE, QUE VIVE EN LA COMUNIDAD DE CAYACHATA PROVINCIA AVAROA ORURO CON SU CONYUGUE Y TRES HIJOS, QUE TRABAJAN EN LA ELABORACIÓN DE QUESO QUE LA COMERCIALIZA EN EL MERCADO INFORMAL Y EN OCASIONES A LAS PENSIONES DE LA CIUDAD DE CHALLAPATA EN LA ACTUALIDAD CUENTA CON 3  CABEZAS LECHERAS ELABORANDO UN PROMEDIO DE 80 QUESOS POR SEMANA ESTA ACTIVIDAD LA REALIZA TODOS LOS DÍAS DURANTE TODO EL AÑO  ACTUALMENTE BUSCA MEJORAR SU CALIDAD Y NIVEL DE VIDA, EL CRÉDITO QUE SOLICITA ES PARA COMPRAR UNA VACA LECHERA Y PODER INCREMENTAR SU ELABORACIÓN DE QUESO EL ESFUERZO DE SU UNIDAD FAMILIAR LE LLEVO A EMPRENDER ESTA ACTIVIDAD SI BIEN LOS INGRESOS QUE PERCIBEN NO SON GRANDES, SOLAMENTE LES ALCANZA PARA PAGAR SUS COSTOS DE VIDA, SEGÚN SU DECLARACIÓN. EL SEÑOR LENIS PODRÁ CONTAR CON UNA LECHERA MÁS Y SERÁ CAPAZ DE INCREMENTAR SU ELABORACIÓN  ESTA FORMA SU EMPRENDIMIENTO IRA CRECIENDO GRADUALMENTE.
texts.en:
Lenis has very humble living conditions.  He lives in the Cayachata community in the Avaroa-Oruro province with his wife and three children.  They work making cheese that they sell at the informal market.  Sometimes they sell to the boarding houses in the city of Challapata.

He currently has three head of dairy cows.  They make an average of 80 cheeses a week.  He carries out this business activity every day throughout the entire year.

He is now looking to improve his quality of life and his standard of living.  The loan he is requesting is to buy a dairy cow to be able to increase the amount of cheese he makes.

His family’s effort brought him to the point of undertaking this business activity.  The income that they get is not big.  He says that it only suffices to pay their cost of living.

Mr. Lenis will be able to have one more dairy cow, and he will be able to increase his production.  This way his venture will be growing gradually.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Ambrosio

texts.es: Don. Ambrosio, tiene 29 años de edad, su familia está compuesta por cuatro miembros dos hijos y los dos padres ( en la foto Don Ambrosio y Esposa), es una familia humilde de escasos recursos económicos, viven en la comunidad de Uchama Baja del municipio de Mizque, del departamento de Cochabamba. Trabaja en la agricultura y la pecuaria, produce papa, frejol y maní; los comercializa en el mismo lugar donde vive a los comerciantes de la misma población de Mizque. Don Ambrosio es una persona muy respetada en su comunidad, por la dedicación a su trabajo y por ser el responsable de la alimentación y la educación de su familia. Tienen una vivienda de paredes de adobe, techo de cañaweca y revoque de barro, esta clase de vivienda cada año antes de las lluvias hay que hacer el revoque, Don Ambrosio, está solicitando el presente crédito para comprar más abono orgánico y tener más y mejor producción y de esta forma podrá mejorar las condiciones de vida de toda su familia.
texts.en:
Mr. Ambrosio, who is 29 years old, is part of a family that is composed of four members; two sons and his two parents (Mr. Ambrosio and his wife are shown in the photo). They are a humble family with scarce economic resources. They live in the community of Uchama Baja, of the municipality of Mizque, in the Cochabamba region.  

He works in agriculture and in livestock. He grows potatoes, beans and peanuts. He sells them in the same place where the merchants live in the same Mizque region. Mr. Ambrosio is a very respectable person in his community because of his dedication to his work and for being responsible in providing for his family's well-being and education. Their home is made of adobe walls, a hollow-reed roof, and a dirt floor. This type of housing must be prepared every year before the rains come.

Mr. Ambrosio is asking for this loan in order to buy more organic fertilizers in order to have better production and in turn, he will be able to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Martin Daniel

texts.es: El Sr. Daniel que es una persona responsable y trabajadora, curso hasta el bachillerato, no pudo seguir con sus estudios superiores por problemas económicos, viéndose en la necesidad de buscar trabajo desde muy joven; es así que hoy en día el desempeña la labor de Expedición de productos por más de 1 año, para una empresa reconocida; aclarar además que el Sr. Daniel se dedica en el tiempo libre al transporte público de pasajeros tratando de hacer el esfuerzo para poder concretar sus sueños de contar con una casa propia y a futuro formar una familia; el Sr. Daniel solicita el presente crédito con el fin de refaccionar el techo de la vivienda ya que por estas épocas de lluvia está siendo afectado, pasando incomodidades; aclarar que esta vivienda es de su madre con la que vive, la misma que está ubicada en el Barrio San Jorge I.
texts.en: Daniel is a hard-working and responsible person. He studied through high school, but was unable to continue with his higher education due to economic problems. He had to look for work from the time he was very young. This is why today he has worked in Products Dispatch for over a year for a well-known company. In his free time, he also works transporting passengers, trying to put forth the effort to realize his dream of having his own house and starting a family in the future. Daniel is applying for this loan to repair the roof of his home, which is being affected by the rainy season, and it is uncomfortable. This house belongs to his mother, with whom he lives in Barrio San Jorge I.

loans.use: to repair his home.

loans.name: Concepción

texts.es: EL SEÑOR CONCEPCIÓN,  TIENE 55 AÑOS DE EDAD,  ES CASADO, TIENE TRES  HIJOS DEPENDIENTES, SU ESPOSA ES LA SEÑORA LIBORIA CON EDAD DE 57 AÑOS QUIEN COLABORA EN LA PRODUCCIÓN AGRÍCOLA LIDERANDO EL MANEJO DE LA FAMILIA. POR LA GRANIZADA QUE CAYÓ POR ESTA ÉPOCA DE LLUVIAS EN LA ZONA, DON CONCEPCIÓN HA PERDIDO GRAN PARTE DE SU PRODUCCIÓN DE PAPA Y FREJOL, EL CUAL ESTABA PLANIFICADO VENDER,  ESTOS CAMBIOS CLIMATOLÓGICOS AFECTO MUCHO EN LA ESTABILIDAD ECONÓMICA SUFRIENDO UN DESEQUILIBRIO ECONÓMICO AFECTANDO DIRECTAMENTE A SUS HIJOS Y  A TODA LA FAMILIA EN LA ADQUISICIÓN DE LOS INSUMOS REQUERIDOS PARA EL INICIO DE LA GESTIÓN ESCOLAR COMO TAMBIÉN EN LA CANASTA FAMILIAR PARA LA ALIMENTACIÓN DE TODA LA FAMILIA. DON CONCEPCIÓN ES UNA PERSONA MUY CONOCIDA  Y RESPETADA EN LA COMUNIDAD POR LO DEDICADO A SU TRABAJO  Y A SU FAMILIA EL ESTA SOLICITANDO ESTE CRÉDITO CON EL OBJETIVO DE COMPRAR NUEVAMENTE SEMILLAS Y ABONOS Y ASÍ VOLVER A SEMBRAR Y RETOMAR EL CAMINO DE LA PROSPERIDAD.
texts.en:
Concepción, aged 55, is married and has three dependent children. His wife is named Liboria, and is 57 years of age. They work together in agricultural production, leading the management of the family. Because of the hail that fell in this rainy season in the area, Concepción has lost most of his crops of potatoes and beans, which he was planning to sell. These changes in climate greatly affect economic stability. Suffering this economic imbalance directly affects his children and his whole family, in the acquisition of the required sums for the start of school as well as the whole family’s basic food needs.

Concepción is very well-known and respected in the community, due to his dedication to his work and to his family. He is applying for this loan with the aim of buying more seeds and fertilizers in order to sow the seeds again and return to the path to prosperity.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Clemente

texts.es: El señor Clemente nacido en la comunidad de Minas Pampa de la Provincia de Tiraque del Departamento de Cochabamba, actualmente vive en su comunidad con su familia (en la foto Sr. Clemente con su familia), la descripción de su casa está construido de barro con techo de teja con revoques de barro la determinación es prácticamente rustico, la comunidad en la que vive está ubicado a 3 km al este de la localidad de Tiraque. La actividad económica es la agricultura que produce tubérculos y cereales, la producción es estacional en la zona son alturas del valle alto. El préstamo que está solicitando es para la compra de abono de gallina, el Sr. Clemente tiene interés de superarse y mejorar sus ingresos económicos en los próximos años, los trabajos agrícolas lo realizan toda la familia en algunos casos con ayuda de sus vecinos para la siembra y la cosecha según sus usos y costumbres los labores culturales trabajan la familia.El anterior préstamo le ayudó bastante con la compra de abono y ganado, por eso ahora quiere incrementar su producción y comprar más abono.
texts.en:
Celemente was born in the Minas Pampas community in the Tiraque province, Cochabamba department.  He currently lives in his community with his family (Clemente appears in the photo with his family).

His house is rustic: it's constructed of mud and has a tile roof with mud plastering. The community where he lives is three kilometers east of the town of Tiraque. The economic activity there is agriculture, which is growing tubers and grains. The production is seasonal in the high regions of the high valley.

The loan that he is requesting is to buy chicken manure.  Clemente is interested in bettering himself and improving his income in the coming years.  His whole family does the agricultural work.  In some cases his neighbors help with the planting and harvesting, as is their custom.

The previous loan helped him quite a bit with the purchase of manure and livestock.  That is why he now wants to increase his production and to buy more manure.

loans.use: to buy chicken manure.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es: EL SRA. TEODORA VIVE EN LA CIUDAD DE CHALLAPATA CON SU MARIDO ES UNA PERSONA DE CONDICIÓN HUMILDE, EN BUSCA DE UN MEJOR NIVEL DE VIDA Y PROSPERIDAD, TRABAJA EN LA PRODUCCIÓN DE YOGUR Y SU RESPECTIVA COMERCIALIZACIÓN LA VENDE EN LA CIUDAD DE CHALLAPATA EN LA ACTUALIDAD CUENTA CON 3 VACAS LECHERAS, CON UNA PRODUCCIÓN PROMEDIO DE 10 LITROS POR DÍA. ES UN NEGOCIO FAMILIAR, Y QUE SE LLEVA A CABO DURANTE TODO EL AÑO, ACTUALMENTE BUSCA MEJORAR SU CALIDAD Y NIVEL DE VIDA, EMPRENDIENDO PEQUEÑAS ACTIVIDADES EN LA LOCALIDAD DE CHALLAPATA, EL CRÉDITO QUE SOLICITA ES PARA EL ALQUILER DE TRACTOR Y ABONAMIENTO DE SUELOS, PARA LA PRODUCCIÓN DE QUINUA, ADEMÁS EL CONYUGUE REALIZA EL SERVICIO DE TAXI, TODOS LOS DÍAS DURANTE LA SEMANA, SI BIEN LOS INGRESOS QUE PERCIBEN NO SON GRANDES, SOLAMENTE LES ALCANZA PARA PAGAR SUS COSTOS DE VIDA. DE ESTA FORMA SU EMPRENDIMIENTO IRA CRECIENDO GRADUALMENTE.
texts.en:
Teodora lives in the city of Challapata with her husband. She is a person of humble means in search of a better standard of life and prosperity.  She works in the production and sale of yogurt. She sells it in the city of Challapata. Currently she relies on three dairy cows.  With one production on average there are 10 liters per day. 

This is a familiar business that is carried out all year round.  Currently she is searching improve her standard of living, undertaking small activities in the area of Challapata.  

The loan that she is requesting is to rent a tractor and purchase soil, for the production of quina. In addition her husband is a taxi driver all of the days during the week. The income that they earn is not large, they only have enough for the costs of their home.  This form of her business will grow gradually.

loans.use: to rent a tractor and purchase soil

loans.name: Froilán

texts.es: El señor: Froilán vive en el barrio Cochabamba, de la población de Bulo Bulo, de la provincia carrasco,  la actividad económica la realiza en su lote agrícola colonia agro ganadera 25 de abril, dicho terreno lo adquirió hace años atrás durante la colonización con mucho esfuerzo y poco a poco,  fue creciendo y actualmente tiene 63 cabezas de ganado vacuno,  entre vacas  y terneras,  de esta actividad  vende anualmente un promedio de 15 cabezas, su potrero es de 19 ha sus hijos ya son dependientes, solo tiene dos hijos que están en la universidad y no pueden ayudarle mucho,  al señor se le hace difícil trabajar solo, por dicha razón contrata mano de obra para  el mantenimiento de potrero  y el presente crédito es solicitado para dicho fin o actividad así el señor Froilán se dedicara más al cuidado de su ganado y podrá tener un potrero limpio ya que cuando el potrero se vuelve barbecho existe la probabilidad del ataque de animales hacia el ganado.
texts.en:
Mr. Froilán lives in the Cochabamba neighborhood, in Bulo Bulo, in the Carrasco province. He makes his living in the agricultural community Colonia Agro Ganadera 25 de Abril. He acquired said land many years ago during colonization and, little by little and through much effort, he has acquired 63 head of cattle, both cows and calves. He is currently committed to selling 15 of them.

He only has two children that are currently in the university, which means that they cannot help him on the farm. It is difficult for him to work alone, and it is for this reason that he contracts laborers in order to maintain his pastures. He is asking for this loan to help pay for hired labor, so that Mr. Froilán can dedicate more time to taking care of his livestock and so that he can have clean pastures. If the pastures become too full of weeds, the probability of other animals attacking his livestock greatly increases.

loans.use: to maintain pastureland.

loans.name: Dionicio

texts.es: Don Dionicio tiene 55 años es una persona trabajadora, trabaja junto a su esposa vendiendo lubricantes (en la foto junto a su esposa) trabajan de manera responsable y sacrificada, a pesar de ser personas de edad siguen trabajando para poder tener ingresos y así poder tener una mejor calidad de vida, sacaron adelante a su hijo que ahora está estudiando en la universidad. Don Dionisio está solicitando este crédito para poder hacer crecer su negocio y  poder comprar mayor cantidad de grasa lubricante y aceite y así poder llegar a más clientes y poder hacer crecer su negocio. Con el tiempo don Dionicio tiene la intención de sacar otro crédito para poder abrir una agencia y así poder llegar a más clientes de otras zonas de la ciudad. Don Dionicio agradece a las personas que colaboraron para poder sacar este crédito ya que gracias a eso podrá mejorar su negocio y llegar a más clientes.
texts.en: Dionicio is 55 years old, and he is a hard worker. He works together with his wife (appearing in the photo) selling lubricants. They work responsibly and selflessly. Despite their age they continue working to earn an income, so as to be able to have a better quality of life. They provided well for their child, who is currently studying in a university. Dionicio is requesting this loan to grow his business and to buy a greater quantity of grease, lubricant, and oil, and in this way, to be able to reach more customers and grow his business. In time, Dionicio intends to take out another loan to be able to open up a branch so as to reach more customers from other areas of the city. Dionico is grateful for the people who collaborated in order for him to be able to take out this loan, since thanks to it, he will be able to improve his business and reach more customers.

loans.use: to buy lubricants and oils.

loans.name: Erminia

texts.es:
ERMINIA, VIVÍA EN UNA COMUNIDAD MUY ALEJADO DEL PUEBLO  ELLA MUY SE CASÓ YA QUE ELLA QUEDO EMBARAZADA Y TUVO QUE DEJAR TODO EN LA ZONA DONDE VIVÍA PARA MIGRAR AL PUEBLO JUNTAMENTE CON EL PADRE DE SU HIJO CON EL TIEMPO QUE ESTUVIERON EN EL PUEBLO TUVIERON OTRO HIJO MAS,  AHORA TIENEN  DOS HIJOS PRECIOSOS, ERMINIA   DESDE EL MOMENTO QUE LLEGO AL PUEBLO YA QUE ES UNA ZONA PRODUCTIVA SE DEDICO A TRABAJAR EN LA AGRICULTURA, PRESTANDO SU SERVICIO COMO JORNAL CON TODA SU FAMILIA PARA PODER SACARLES ADELANTE,  EN LA ANTERIOR COSECHA HUBO UN DESASTRE NATURAL  DE UNA GRANIZADA EN TODA LA ZONA,  LA PARCELA DONDE TRABAJABA  BAJARON DE RENDIMIENTO, ESTE DESASTRE LE HIZO FRACASAR EN SUS INGRESOS ECONÓMICOS A TODA SU FAMILIA QUE SE MANTENÍAN CON LA PRODUCCIÓN AGRÍCOLA DE SU PEQUEÑA PARCELA. 
ERMINIA ES UNA MADRE EJEMPLAR  MUY QUERIDA Y RESPETADA EN EL LUGAR DONDE VIVE, POR LO DEDICADA A TODA SU FAMILIA  Y SU TRABAJO,  ELLA  ESTÁ SOLICITANDO EL CRÉDITO PARA COMPRAR MAS SEMILLA DE CEBOLLA Y  ABONO ORGÁNICO Y DE ESTA FORMA MEJORARA LA CALIDAD Y EL RENDIMIENTO DE SUS CULTIVOS, PARA MEJORARA SUS INGRESOS ECONÓMICOS Y  DARLE UNA MEJOR CALIDAD DE VIDA A SUS PEQUEÑOS HIJOS. Y QUE ELLOS  PUEDAN ASISTIR A LA ESCUELA  EN MEJORES CONDICIONES.  EL CRÉDITO AYUDARA MUCHO A TODA SU FAMILIA Y AL DURO  TRABAJO QUE REALIZAN TODOS.
texts.en:
Erminia used to live in a community very far from her town. She got married when she became pregnant, and had to leave everything in the area she lived to migrate to the town, together with the father of her child. In the time they were in the town they had another child. They now have two beautiful children.

Erminia, from the moment she arrived in the town, a productive area, has dedicated herself to working in agriculture. She works as a labourer, with all her family, in order to help them to be successful.  In the last harvest season there was a natural disaster, and hail fell on the whole area. The yield fell on the plot where she worked, and this disaster caused her to fail to bring earnings home to her family, who live on the agricultural production of the small plot. 

Erminia is an exemplary mother, well-loved and respected in the place where she lives, due to her dedication to her family and her work. She is applying for this loan to buy more onion seeds and organic fertilizer, and in this way improve the quality and yield of her crop, to improve her earnings and give a better quality of life to her small children, and so that they can attend school in better conditions. The loan will provide much help for the family and for the hard work they all carry out.

loans.use: to buy onion seeds and organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Melania

texts.es: LA SEÑORA MELANIA VIVE EN EL BARRIO MAGISTERIO DE LA POBLACION DE BULO BULO, PERTENECIENTE AL TROPICO DE COCHABAMBA (EN LA FOTO ESTÁ CON SU FAMILIA), ELLOS EMIGRARON DE ORURO DE UNO DE LOS LUGARES POBRES DE BOLIVIA,  BUSCANDO MEJORES OPORTUNIDADES DE VIDA,  HACE 7 AÑOS ATRÁS A LA CASA DE UN CONOCIDO Y SE COMPRARON SU TERRENO AGRICOLA DESPUES DE UN TRABAJO DURO DE DOS AÑOS, COMO JORNALEROS  Y ACTUALMENTE TRABAJAN  5 AÑOS EN SU TERRENO DONDE LLEVAN A CAVO SUS ACTIVIDADES ECONOMICAS, ACTUALMENTE TIENEN EN PRODUCCION  ARROZ Y  YUCA. TIENE UNA VENTA PROMEDIO ANUAL DE LOS PRODUCTOS: YUCA (1HA) DE LA CUAL COSECHA 400 QQ P/U, ARROZ (1HA) 25QQ. EL PRESENTE CREDITO SOLICITADO ES PARA EL  MANTENIMIENTO DEL CULTIVO DE YUCA QUE ESTA EN UNA PRODUCCION OPTIMA,  Y REQUIERE DE CIERTOS CUIDADOS COMO EL CONTROL DE MALEZAS,  Y EL CONTROL DE PLAGAS  Y OTROS. PO OTRO LADO SI LOS CLIENTES NO CONTARAN  CON EL PRESENTE CREDITO NO PODRA OBTENER BUENA COSECHA.
texts.en:
Melania lives in the district Magisterio of the town Bulo Bulo, which belongs to the tropical area of Cochabamba (in the photo she is with her family). They emigrated from Oruro seven years ago from one of the poor areas of Bolivia, seeking better opportunities.

They bought an agricultural plot after two years of hard work as day-laborers and presently they have worked for 5 years on their land where they carry out their economic activities. Currently they produce rice and yucca. The average annual sales of their products are: yucca (1 hectare) of which they harvest 400 QQ P/U, rice (1 hectare) 25QQ.

The requested loan is for the maintenance of their cultivation of yucca which presently is in ideal production, and requires specific care such as the control of weeds, and the control of pests and others. Without this loan the clients will not be able to have a good harvest.

loans.use: to maintain the cultivation of yucca

loans.name: Seferino

texts.es: El señor Seferino  tiene 43 años, vive con su esposa Santusa, su domicilio está ubicado en la comunidad de Vallecito, a 35 km. de la ciudad de Monteagudo. Ellos se dedican a la cría y venta de cerdos cabañeros en su pequeña mini cabaña que tienen, también producen maíz para consumo de ellos como de sus cerdos, por otra parte obtiene ingresos por trabajos de albañil que el realiza en la comunidad y comunidades vecinas. Ambos trabajan arduamente para cubrir gastos de alimentación, ropa, útiles y estudios de sus hijos que se encuentran estudiando en la escuela, es por eso  que están solicitando crédito para compra de alambre de púas y pago de rallado de postes de madera y compra de 3 cerdas cabañeras, así para que su ganado pueda estar en un lugar más seguro.
texts.en:
Señor Seferino is 43 years old and lives with his wife Santusa.  His home is located in the community of Vallecito, 35 km from the city of Monteagudo.  They make a living raising and selling pigs for livestock from the small hut that they have.  They also produce corn for their own consumption, as well as for that of their pigs.  On the other hand, he gets income through bricklaying jobs that he does in the community and neighboring community.  

They both work hard to cover the expenses of food, clothing, tools, and education for their children who are in school.  This is why they are asking for a loan to buy barbed wire, to pay for shredded wood framing, and to buy three pigs for livestock.  This way his livestock can be in a safer place.

loans.use: to buy supplies for fencing in his pigs, and to buy three pigs for livestock.

loans.name: Gloria Nelly

texts.es: La Sra. Gloria esta casada y tiene 2 hijos, su esposo trabaja en la mina por esta razón no vive junto a ellos y viene esporádicamente a visitaros, por esta razón ella es el pilar fundamental de su familia por que tiene la responsabilidad de la crianza de sus hijos. Se dedica a la venta de pollo en el mercado rodríguez muy conocido en la ciudad de La Paz, donde empieza a trabajar desde las 5:30 a.m.  que es la hora que le entregan los pollos para que pueda venderlos en el día. De acuerdo  a los días de feria se queda en el puesto vendiendo hasta las 8 de la noche en algunas ocasiones para así poder vender un poco mas y tener mejores ingresos.   Esta solicitando el crédito para poder refaccionar su puesto de venta , hacer mantenimiento a  sus instrumentos de trabajo y comprar mas mercadería para la venta y así poder mejorar sus ingresos y la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Ms. Gloria is married and has two children. Her husband works in a mine, and for this reason he does not live with with them but only visits on occasion. She is a fundamental pillar in her family because it is her responsibility to raise their children.   

She dedicates herself to the sale of chicken in the Rodríguez Market, a well-known market in the city of La Paz. She begins her day at 5:30 AM, the time at which the chicken is delivered to be sold that day. She sometimes continues working until 8:00 at night in order to sell a little more and thus increase her profits. 

She is asking for a loan in order to make some renovations on her sales stall, to perform maintenance on some of her work instruments, and to buy merchandise to sell. This way, she will be able to increase her income and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to renovate her sales stall, to perform maintainence on her work instruments, and to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Nicolaza

texts.es: La  Señora Nicolaza tiene 36 años es madre soltera tiene 2 hijos menores dependientes que estudian en nivel primaria y su madre que tiene 62 años ellos viven en la comunidad de Aguirre está ubicado a 42 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba, Doña Nicolaza es agricultora percibe ingreso económico por la venta de papa, haba, oca en su terreno que tiene 1.2 Has, que es herencia de sus padres, tiene ganado vacuno 2 lecheras, 2 de engorde, es una persona humilde pero trabajadora,  necesitaba dinero para la muralla de su vivienda, el capital que tenía invertió en la mejora de sus casa. La Sra. Nicolaza está muy contenta de poder accedes a esta oportunidad porque seguirá mejorando su vivienda para darle un mejor hogar a sus dos hijos. Con anterior crédito le ayudo mucho al poder comprara insumos agrícolas para su producción.
texts.en:
Nicolaza, 36, is a single mother who has two dependent minor children that are studying at primary level and her mother is 62 years old. They live in the community of Aguirre, which is located 42 kilometers from the city of Cochabamba. 

Nicolaza is a farmer who receives her income from the sale of potatoes, beans, and geese. She has 1.2 hectares of land which she inherited from her parents. She has cattle, two milk cows and two cows for fattening. 

She is humble but hard-working person. She needs money for the wall of her home. She invested the capital she had in home improvements. Nicolaza is very happy to be able to access this opportunity because she can continue improving her house in order to provide a better home to her two children. The prior loan helped her greatly to be able to buy agricultural supplies for more production.

loans.use: to build a wall for her home

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
El Señor Alberto de 21 años de edad soltero, con instrucción de nivel primario, vive en una comunidad rural Chullpani - Tabla Mayu hacia el Norte de Colomi.
El Sr. Alberto cuenta con una actividad económica producción agrícola, vende papa, papaliza, haba y oca, además cuenta con ganado vacuno 3 de engorde, 2 de lecheras y 2 terneros de esta forma se mantiene económicamente a través de su trabajo para la alimentación, el necesita un crédito para la compra de 1 hectárea de terreno y poder ampliar su producción agrícola, así poder generar más ingresos económicos a futuro, por este motivo solicita este préstamo ya que el ahorro que tenía lo invirtió en compra de insumos agrícolas. Comentar que se siente contento de poder acceder al préstamo solicitado, además entusiasmado por la compra del terreno, el esta seguro que es una buena inversión la compra de terreno agrícola porque incrementara su capacidad de producción.
texts.en:
Señor Alberto is 21 years old, single, and has only a primary school education.  He lives in Tablamayu, a rural community of Chullpani, toward the north of Colomi.

Señor Alberto makes a living through agricultural production by selling potatoes, ulluco, broad beans, and yams.  He also has cattle: three for fattening, two dairy cows, and two calves.  Thus he maintains his finances through his work for food production.  

He needs a loan to buy one hectare of land and be able to increase his agricultural production, thus generating more income in the future.  For this reason he asks for the loan since what he saved was invested in the purchase of agricultural supplies.  He says that he is happy to be able to have access to the requested loan, and is excited to buy the land.  He is certain that buying the land is a good investment because it will increase his production capacity.

loans.use: to buy farm land.

loans.name: Asteria

texts.es: La señora Asteria es nacida el 3 de marzo de 1969 en la comunidad de Chago de la provincia de Tiraque del Departamento de Cochabamba, la señora en realidad vive junto a su madre que ya se encuentra de tercera edad, por otro lado la Sra. Asteria vive en una habitación rustica construida por ellos, de material de adobe con techo de tejas antiguas pero por lo menos cuentan con servicios básicas la comunidad donde vive, la actividad a que se dedica la señora Asteria es la producción agrícola que produce los tubérculos y cereales, en el lugar son épocas estacionales sus productos le comercializa en el mercado local. La Sra. Asteria tiene intenciones de mejorar sus ingresos económicos en el futuro, para ello esta solicitando un crédito pecuario para la compra de yunta (dos toros) con el presente crédito,  manifiesta que mejorará sus ingresos y continuará ayudando a sus padres ya que sus otros hermanos no le ayudan.
texts.en:
Ms. Asteria, born on March 3rd, 1969 in the Chago community in the Tiraque province, which is in the Cochabamba Department. She lives with her elderly mother, in a rustic room that they built together out of adobe and a roof made of old tiles. At least they can count upon basic services from the community where they live. 

Ms. Asteria dedicates herself to the agricultural production of tubers and grains, which she sells her products in the local market. She intends to improve her economic earnings in the future, and this is why she is applying for a livestock credit so that she can buy a pair of oxen (two bulls). She states that in doing so, she will be able to increase her income and will be able to continue helping her parents, since her other siblings don't do so.

loans.use: to buy bulls.

loans.name: Carla Ivana

texts.es: La Sra. Ivana es una persona responsable, dedicada a su trabajo y su familia, es madre soltera tiene dos hijos pequeños a los cuales apoya y ayuda en su educación se dedica al servicio de comidas, alquila un pequeño lugar en Ivirgarzama, Av. Mortenzon s/n a lado del coliseo carrasco, vende desde almuerzo y cena, cuenta con bastante gente la cual acude por el servicio que ella brinda, La Sra. Ivana vive en alquiler en un cuartito pequeño, ella se levanta a muy tempranas horas por la mañana para alistar a sus hijos, preparar el desayuno y así poder enviarlos al colegio, después se dedica a la compra de verduras, carne y/o ingredientes que le falta para empezar su trabajo cotidiano, la Sra. Ivana solicita un crédito en nuestra institución para la ampliación de su negocio, para asi mejorar un poco la calidad y el servicio y comodidad de sus clientes, así mejorar sus ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ivana is a responsible person, dedicated to her work and her family. She is a single mother with 2 small children that she helps with their education. She serves meals from a tiny location she rents in Ivergarzama. It is located on Mortenzon Avenue, alongside the Carrasco Coliseum. Ivana sells meals, including breakfast and supper. She can count on lots of customers who like her service.

Ivana lives in a small rented room. She rises every day in the early hours of the morning to prepare her children, and breakfast, and to send them off to school. Then she buys the vegetables, meat, and/or ingredients she needs to begin her daily work.

Ivana is requesting a loan from our institution to expand her business, and to improve somewhat the quality, service, and the comfort of her customers. And, thereby, to improve her income and her quality of life.

loans.use: to expand her food service business.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Don. Luis, tiene 45 años de edad, su familia está compuesta por dos miembros un hijo y su padre, es una familia humilde de escasos recursos económicos, viven en la comunidad de Callejas Baja del municipio de Mizque, del departamento de Cochabamba. Trabaja en la agricultura y la pecuaria, produce papa, frejol y cebolla; los comercializa en el mismo lugar donde vive a los comerciantes de la misma población de Mizque. Don Luis es una persona muy respetada en su comunidad, por la dedicación a su trabajo y por ser el responsable de la alimentación y la educación de su familia. Tienen una vivienda de paredes de adobe, techo de cañaweca y revoque de barro, esta clase de vivienda cada año antes de las lluvias hay que hacer el revoque, Don Luis, está solicitando el presente crédito para comprar más semillas, abonos y agroquímicos y tener más y mejor producción y de esta forma mejorar las condiciones de vida de toda su familia.
texts.en: Don Luis is 45 years old. His family is made up of two members, a son and father. It is a modest, economically disadvantaged family. They live in the Callejas Baja community in the town of Mizque located in the Cochabamba department. He works in agriculture and livestock. She grows potatoes, beans and onions. He sells them in the same place where the merchants live in Mizque. Don Luis is a much respected person in his community due to his dedication to his work and because he is responsible for feeding and educating his family. They have a home with adobe walls, a thatched roof, and mud plaster.  With this type of home, every year before the rainy season, the house must be plastered. Don Luis requested the current loan to purchase more seeds, fertilizers and agrochemicals in order to have a larger and better harvest.  With this, he can improve his family’s lives.

loans.use: purchase seeds, fertilizer and agrochemicals.

loans.name: Claudina

texts.es: La Sra. Claudina es una persona humilde  que se dedica a la actividad de la lechería y agricultura, en la última gestión le fue regular  porque sus lecheras estan en estado de preñez por lo que bajo sus ingresos, y para aumentar el número de lecheras quiere la ayuda necesaria , pese a estos antecedentes ponen los esfuerzos necesarios junto a su esposo  para sustentar  las necesidades básicas de la familia , que día a día busca el superarse junto a sus hijas por un futuro mejor,  con la participación activa de la familia en la agricultura.  la zona donde realiza la actividad  es lugar potencial de la lechería y la agricultura es por eso que  ella necesita el crédito, para poder fortalecer  su actividad  con el aumento de número de cabezas lecheras, a su manera de desempeño es muy trabajadora  empeñosa. Además doña Claudina es una persona sociable en su zona, el cual le da oportunidad de relacionarse y poder transmitir la ayuda prestada a otras personas.
texts.en:
Claudina is a humble person who earns her living though milk production and agriculture.  

Over the last season it had not been going well because her milk-cows are pregnant. Because of her low income, and in order to increase her number of milk-cows, she needs some help.

Despite these circumstances, she and her husband are trying to provide the basic necessities for her family, which every day seeks to improve, together with her daughters, for a better future with the participation of the entire family in agriculture. 

The area where she carries out her business has a strong potential for agriculture and milk production. For this reason she is asking for a loan, to strengthen her activity with an increase in the number of milking cows. She is very hardworking and determined. She is also very sociable in the area, which allows her to form relationships with people and spread the effects of the loan throughout the zone.

loans.use: to buy milk cows.

loans.name: Ariel

texts.es:
El señor Ariel tiene 32 años está casado con la señora Lucy, tienen 3 hijas que dependen de sus ingresos, viven en la provincia de Punata de la ciudad de Cochabamba, gracias a su trabajo lograron construir una casa en un terreno que la madre le dio de herencia, son una familia humilde pero unidos, la señora Lucy es profesora de primaria, pero por el gran desempleo que hay en el país no puede conseguir un ítem para trabajar por lo tanto se dedica a la misma actividad de su esposo  que es la producción de la leche cruda, cuenta con cabezas de ganado lechero en su mismo domicilio, el producto venden a una empresa que se dedica a la elaboración de productos lácteos, el destino del crédito es para la compra de forraje con lo cual mejora la alimentación de su ganado, además  en el último año ha  incrementado  su ganado lechero por lo tanto también tienen la necesidad de aumentar forraje. Es la segunda vez que se beneficia con el crédito kiva,  el señor Ariel, declara que está muy contento con el primer crédito ya que le ayudo mucho para la compra de un ganado lechero.
Entre sus sueños y metas esta incrementar su ganado lechero hasta tener una pequeña granja de por lo menos 30 cabezas y que sus tres hijas puedan estudiar una carrera profesional para que de esa manera puedan tener un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Ariel is 32 years old and married to Lucy. They have three daughters who depend on their income. They live in the province of Punata in the city of Cochabamba. Thanks to their work they were able to build a house on a plot inherited from his mother. They are a humble but united family. Lucy is a primary school teacher, but because of widespread unemployment in the country she cannot obtain a position and therefore she works in the same field as her husband, producing raw milk. They have dairy cows in their home. They sell the milk to a business that makes dairy products.

The purpose of the loan is to buy fodder to improve the diet of the cows. Also, in the last year they increased the number of dairy cattle and therefore these also need additional fodder.

This is the second time that Ariel is benefiting from a Kiva loan. He says that he is very happy with the first loan since it helped him a lot in buying a dairy cow. Among his dreams and goals is to grow his herd of dairy cattle until he has a small farm with at least 30 cows, and for his three daughters to study a professional career in order to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fodder for his dairy cows

loans.name: Guztavo Leon

texts.es: Gustavo, joven emprendedor, con la idea de generar ingresos para solventar sus gastos, se da modos de investigar y crear algunos juegos y trucos de magia, al paso del tiempo, es que con sus diseños, crea y manda a realizar la impresión de las tapas de los que él llama sus maletines de magia, los cuales contienen, naipes, pitas y otros materiales que logran divertir y entretener a personas que les llama la atención los mismos, él considera que también son juegos para niños que están en etapa escolar pues les ayuda a hacer volar la imaginación. Tiene 2 hijas pequeñas y  a muy corto plazo desea formar su familia, porque por el momento él se dedica bastante a viajar al interior donde lo esperan en ferias y mercados para dejar sus productos, tiene bastantes aspiraciones y pretende asentarse en un solo lugar de manera que ya pueda consolidar su hogar. Necesita del crédito para abastecerse de material  y poder armar sus maletines de magia, y así poder generar mayores ingresos con la venta de los mismos.El quedó muy satisfecho con el anterior crédito, por eso ahora quiere seguir incrementando su capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Gustavo is an enterprising young man with the idea of increasing his income to help pay his bills.  He comes up with ideas for and creates games and magic tricks.  Over time he has also used his designs to create covers for what he calls "magic boxes."  They contain playing cards, whistles, and other things.  They are fun and entertaining to those that buy them.  He also thinks that the games are well-suited for school-age children because they help them use their imagination.

He has 2 young daughters and he hopes to add to his family shortly, but for the moment he spends a large amount of his time traveling to the city where he drops off his products at shops and markets.  He has many goals and he hopes to settle in one place so he can focus more on his family.

He needs this loan to stock up on supplies so he can put together his magic boxes and in this way increase his income by selling more of them.  He was very satisfied with his previous loan and for this reason wants to continue increasing his working capital.

loans.use: buy materials to put together his "magic boxes."

loans.name: Basilio

texts.es: El Señor Basilio de 54 años de edad casado con cinco hijos dependientes, con instrucción de nivel primario, vive en una comunidad rural Liriuni hacia el este de Colomi. El Sr. Basilio cuenta con una actividad económica producción agrícola, vende papa, haba y oca, además cuenta con ganado vacuno 2 de engorde y 1 lechera, de esta forma se mantiene económicamente atraves de su trabajo para la alimentación, el necesita un crédito para la compra de 2 cabezas de ganado vacuno de engorde y poder aumentar su ganado a la vez incrementar su capital,  por este motivo solicita el préstamo ya que el ahorro que tenía lo invirtió en compra de insumos agrícolas.  El Sr. Basilio, se siente contento de poder acceder a este préstamo, el asegura que es una buena inversión la compra de ganado vacuno porque aprovecha esta época del año donde existe bastante forraje y pasto para la alimentación y crecimiento de sus ganados.
texts.en:
Basilio, 54, married with five dependent children in primary school, lives in Liriuni, a rural community east of Colomi. Basilio’s economic activity is agricultural production. He sells potatoes, beans and oca. In addition, he has 2 beef cattle and 1 dairy cattle, thus he supported financially through his work for food. 

He needs a loan for the purchase of 2 beef cattle and to be able to increase his cattle while increasing his capital, for this reason he is requesting a loan since the savings he had he invested in the purchase of agricultural supplies. 

Basilio, feels happy to be able to have this loan. He assures that the purchase of beef cattle is a good investment because he will take advantage of this time of year where there is a lot of forage and grass for the feeding and growth of his cattle.

loans.use: to buy beef cattle.

loans.name: Aniceto

texts.es: Don Aniceto, de 32 años de edad, concubinado, dos hijos, bachiller. Un hombre muy responsable con ganas de progresar en la vida junto a su familia. El vivia en la población de Samuzabety perteneciente al Municipio de Villa Tunari. El criaba ganado vacuno. Ahora por motivos familiares se fue a vivir al Municipio de Chimore junto a la familia de su esposa que le brindaron apoyo incondicional, dandole un lugar donde su familia y el puedan vivir. Pero a pesar de ello el quiere salir adelante por medios propios. Sus suegros le otorgaron parte de un chaco agricola donde el piensa producir piña ya que tiene experiencia en el rubro. Y su otro propósito es comprarse una moto, para trabajar como mototaxista dentro la población, y poco a poco reunir más y aumentar su producción de piña, y dar mejor calidad de vida a su esposa y a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Aniceto, who is 32, lives with his partner and is the father of two children. He is educated to secondary level. He is a very responsible man whose desire is for his family to make progress in life.  
He used to live in the village of Samuzabety in Villa Tunari municipality, where he reared cattle.  Now, for family reasons, he has gone to live in Chimore municipality.  Here, his wife's family provide unconditional support and a place for him and his family to live.  But, in spite of that, he wants to get by on his own.  His in-laws gave him part of a plot of land where he is thinking of growing pineapples, as he has experience in this field.  
His other ambition is to buy a motorcycle so that he can provide a motor taxi service around the town. This will allow him to gradually save more, increase his pineapple production and provide a better quality of life for his wife and children.

loans.use: buy a motocycle and grow pineapples

loans.name: Bakar

texts.en:
Bakar is 24 years old. He lives in Kutaisi District, West Georgia, with his 24-year-old wife, 53-year-old father, and an infant, Barbare. Bakar requested a loan from local financial institutions several times for a family business start-up, but without any success. His loan request was rejected all the time, because of low income and the family’s poor living conditions.
 
Bakar’s father is a car artisan. He works on private orders, fixes the cars and gets a small salary, which is the only source of the income for the family.

Recently, Bakar requested a loan from Credo to start up a family business. His loan request was approved, in the frame of a new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The Start-up loan program envisages provision of business start-up and restart-up credits, with soft conditions, to rural poor people, who do not have access to other credit products, being regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of low income.

With the received credit, Bakar will purchase a car at a low cost, to resell it with the price mark-up. He will reinvest the income to buy another car and develop this business. This will significantly increase the income for the family, and Bakar will be able to provide better living conditions for his young child.

loans.use: To purchase a car at a low cost, to resell it later with the price mark-up

loans.name: Demetrio

texts.es: Don Demetrio, una persona de 56 años de edad, bachiller, tiene 5 hijos. Una persona muy respetuosa y humilde. El vive en la población de Agrigento cerca a Villa Tunari, Km 165 de la carretera Cochabamba - Santa Cruz. El lugar donde vive es popular por la venta de caldos de pezcado, donde el tenía su restaurant, que administraba su esposa. Tenian deudas con algunas instituciones financieras. El trabajaba en la mina y mandaba su dinero a su esposa para los gastos, pero cuenta él que su esposa se retraso en pago de las deudas y llegaron a separarse por esta situación, su esposa se fue a Cochabamba y el tuvo que hacerse responsable de su familia y poco a poco solucionó sus cuentas pendientes. Alquiló a otra persona el restaurant que tiene y ahora trabaja en Chimore como chofer en una distribuidora de gas. Sus hijos, la mayoria independientes lo apoyan y el ahora junto a su hija (en la foto Sr. Demetrio con su hija) solicita el crédito para situar otro restaurant dentro el terreno que tiene para tambien alquilarlo. Y mejorar sus ingresos y calidad de vida.
texts.en: Demetrio, 56, has a high-school education and five children. He is very respectful and humble. He lives in Agrigento near Villa Tunari, Km 165 on the Cochabamba - Santa Cruz highway. The place he lives is popular for its fish soups. He had a restaurant there, that his wife managed. They were indebted to some financial institutions. He worked in the mine and sent his money to his wife for expenses. But he says that she got behind in the payments and they separated because of the situation. His wife went to Cochabamba and he had to take charge of his family, and little by little he resolved his accounts. He rented the restaurant out to another person and now he works in Chimore as a driver at a gas distributor. His children, most of whom are independent, support him, and along with his daughter (pictured) he is asking for the loan to set up another restaurant on the land they have so they can rent it as well. And improve their income and quality of life.

loans.use: to remodel a restaurant.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es: El señor Pedro tiene 26 años de edad, vive con su madre Indalicia, su domicilio está ubicado en el barrio José barbero de la zona de Candua a  5 km de la Ciudad de Monteagudo. Su principal actividad  es la prestación de servicios como albañil, realizando todo tipo de construcciones de vivienda para las personas de nuestra ciudad de Monteagudo tanto del área urbana como rural. Está solicitando crédito para comprar vigas de madera y calaminas y poder techar la casa que construyeron en terrenos de su madre, para que así estén en un lugar más cómodo y tranquilo, ya que en la vivienda que viven no está en buenas condiciones y se entra aguas a veces cuando llueve. Techando su vivienda don pedro podrá tener vivienda y puedan alquilar cuartos y generar ingresos extras para cubrir los gastos de servicios básicos, alimentación, ropa y otros que ellos tienen.
texts.en:
Pedro is 26 years old and lives with his mother, Indalicia.  Their house is located in the José Barbero neighborhood in the zone of Candua, 5 kilometers from the city of Monteagudo.  His main job is loaning out his services as a construction worker.  He works on all kinds of home construction jobs for the citizens of Monteagudo, including both the rural and the urban areas.

He is asking for this loan to buy wooden beams and corrugated sheet metal so he can build a roof for the house that they built on his mother's land.  By so doing, they will be able to live in a more comfortable and tranquil place, since the house where they currently live is in bad condition (it floods when it rains and has other problems).

By building their roof, Pedro will be able to have a place to live and also rent out rooms, earning extra income to help cover their expenses, such as food and clothing, among other things.

loans.use: buy wooden beams and corrugated sheet metal.

loans.name: Vannia Erika

texts.es: La Sra.
