Vannia, es un señora de 38 años de edad, está casada con el señor Carlos, trabaja en una empresa de Telecomunicaciones en la ciudad de Cochabamba, actualmente la vive por la zona norte de la ciudad, aproximadamente a 10 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba, la casa donde vive no es propia,  vive con su esposo en alquiler, ambos tienen 2 hijos dependientes a su cargo y el destino del nuevo crédito de la institución es para la compra de mercadería, debido a que se dedica a la venta de accesorios de celulares, en la actualidad la mercadería que maneja está muy caro, y necesita el capital para el negocio, ya que se está agotando el pago del alquiler de la casa donde viven y de la tienda del negocio.
texts.en:
Vannia is 38 years old. She is married to Carlos and works in a telecommunications company in the city of Cochabamba. Currently she lives in the northern part of the city, approximately 10 km from the city of Cochabamba. The house where she lives is not her own and she lives with her husband in a rental. They have two dependent children in their care.

The new loan from the institution is earmarked for the purchase of merchandise, due to the fact that she sells cell phone accessories. Currently the merchandise that she handles is very expensive and she needs capital for the business. This is because her capital is being used up by the rent on the house where she lives and on her store

loans.use: To buy merchandise.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es: EL SEÑOR: VICTOR VIVE EN EL SINDICATO RUMI TAMBO, PERTENECIENTE AL DEPARTAMENTO DE  COCHABAMBA, PROVINCIA CARRASCO, MUNICIPIO  DE ENTRE RIOS,  ACTUALMENTE VIVE, JUNTO A SU CONCUBINA Y SUS 4 HIJOS EN EL TERRENO QUE ADQUIRIO CON MUCHO ESFUERZO DURANTE LA COLONIZACION,  TIENE EN PRODUCCIÓN PIÑA Y ARROZ Y OTROS PRODUCTOS EN MENOR ESCALA PARA CONSUMO FAMILIAR. TIENE UNA VENTA PROMEDIO ANUAL DE LOS PRODUCTOS: PIÑA(1HA) 18000 UNIDADES, Y ARROZ (1HA) 25QQ  PRODUCTOS LA VENTA DE LA PRODUCCION LA REALIZA EN EL LUGAR DE ORIGEN O  EN EL MERCADO CERCANO.  LA ACTIVIDAD ES ESTACIONAL Y REGULAR A LO LARGO DEL AÑO. EL PRESENTE CREDITO SOLICITADO SERA UTILIZADO PARA LA AMPLIACION Y MANTENIMIENTO DEL CULTIVO DE PIÑA,  ESTA PRODUCCION LE GENERA BUENOS INGRESOS ECONOMICOS, YA QUE  LOS RECURSOS CON LOS CUALES CUENTA NO SON SUFICIENTES PARA LLEVAR A CAVO TODA LA ACTIVIDAD. CON EL PRESENTE CREDITO EL CLIENTE PODRA AMPLIAR Y REALIZAR EL MANTENIMIENTO DE  LA PRODUCCION DEL CULTIVO DE  PIÑA Y ASI CRECER MAS COMO PRODUCTOR.
texts.en:
Sr. Victor lives in the neighborhood of Rumi Tambo, which is in Carrasco Province in the Department of Cochabamba. The town is situated among some rivers. Victor is currently in a common-law relationship and has four children. He owns land that he acquired with great effort during the colonization period.

Victor produces pineapple, rice, and other products on a smaller scale for family consumption. His average annual sales include 18,000 units of pineapple grown on one hectare of land and 25 quintales (1 quintal = 100 kilograms) of rice that is grown on another hectare of land. Whatever he produces is sold from his farm or at the nearby market. This business activity has a regular season that lasts throughout the year.

The loan he is currently requesting will be used to expand and maintain his pineapple crop, which produces sufficient output to generate a good income. Victor’s resources are not sufficient to carry out all of his activities, so this current loan will expand and maintain his pineapple production. As a result, he can grow as a farmer.

loans.use: to expand and maintain his pineapple crop.

loans.name: Cintia

texts.es: Cintia tiene 31 años tiene 2 hijos bajo su cargo, ella trabaja como administradora en una fábrica de chicha donde su trabajo es bastante riesgoso ya que va a las chicherías hacer la entrega de la chicha y hacer los cobros de los turriles que dejo por semana, y tiene que lidiar con personas que están bebiendo y algunos se encuentran en estado de ebriedad. Cintia está pidiendo este crédito para poder terminar la construcción de su casa ya que ella hace un año se vino de Santa Cruz con toda su familia y viven en la casa de su mama, Cintia está haciendo la construcción de su casita para darles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida teniendo su casa propia, Cintia en un futuro pretende sacar otro crédito para poder poner su negocio propio y así tener mejores ingresos y darles mejor vida a sus hijos. Cintia agradece mucho a las personas que hicieron posibles con su apoyo la mejora de la vivienda para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Cintia is 31 years old and has two children under her care. She works as a manager at a plant that makes “chicha” (a corn-based beverage). The work can be a bit risky because the workers in charge of delivering and collecting the barrels each week have been drinking. Some of them are in a drunken state, so she must deal with them.

Cintia is requesting a loan so that she can finish the construction of her house. She moved to Santa Cruz a year ago with her entire family and they currently live at her mother’s house. By building a cottage of her own, Cintia wants to provide her children a better quality of life. In the future, she intends to obtain another loan so that she can start her own business and generate more income in order for her children to have a better life.

Cintia is grateful to the people who made this support possible so that she can provide a better home for her children.

loans.use: to pay for the construction of her home.

loans.name: Weimar Alan

texts.es: El señor Weimar tiene 23 años, es soltero, vive en casa de sus padres y también trabaja en terrenos de sus padres, que está ubicado en la comunidad de Chuya yacu a 25 Km. de la ciudad de Monteagudo. Él se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos parrilleros en su pequeña granja que tiene, vende durante 4 veces al año, obtienen ingresos de la única actividad que realiza para cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, ropa  y otros que tiene el como también  de sus padres y hermano. Está solicitando crédito para la construcción de galpón para cría de cerdos, ya que es profesional en el rubro y conoce bastante porque más antes ya trabajo en SENASAG, como Auxiliar Zoosanitario, tiene experiencia para poder dedicarse a esta actividad y de esta manera tener mejores ingresos para poder adquirir su propio terreno para trabajar en el campo y construir su casita y así poder tener una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Sr. Weimar is 23 years old and unmarried. He lives with his parents and also works on their land, which is located in the community of Chuya Yacu, some 25 km. from the city of Monteagudo. He raises and sells broiler chickens in his small barnyard. He sells four times a year and earns an income from this one business to cover not only his own costs of food and clothing, but also those of his parents and brother. 

Weimar is requesting a loan in order to build a barn. He wants to raise pigs because he is a professional in the field and knows a great deal due to the fact that he previously worked for the National Service of Agricultural Health and Food Safety (SENASAG) as an Assistant Animal Health Officer. Consequently he has the experience to engage in this activity and thus earn more income so that he can acquire his own land. He wants to  work his own land, build a little house and have a better life.

loans.use: to build a barn in order to raise pigs.

loans.name: Alfonso

texts.es: El Sr. Alfonso es una persona humilde  se dedica a la actividad de construcción de viviendas como albañil y agricultura, durante el transcurso del tiempo se dedicó a su actividad con  mucho esfuerzo y responsabilidad  a su cargo tiene su familia y tiene que  llevar el pan de cada día todo los días y sus hijos están en proceso de formación educativa lo cual también implica gastos,  que junto a su esposa y sus hijos ponen los esfuerzos necesarios  por un futuro mejor,  con la participación activa de la familia en la agricultura que es una fuente de ingreso alternativo pero no contaban con recursos necesarios para poder ampliar la producción de hortalizas por eso solicitan el crédito. Además don Alfonso es una persona sociable en su zona, es muy respetado por el trabajo que realiza.
texts.en:
Sr. Alfonso is a responsible individual. He works as a farmer and also builds homes as a stonemason. Over time, he has worked very hard in his business activities since he is responsible for his family and must provide for their daily needs and his children’s education. His wife and children also contribute to the needed efforts so that they will have a better future.

His family participates in the farming activities as an additional source of income, but he does not have the necessary resources to expand his vegetable production. Therefore, he is requesting this loan. Don Alfonso is one of the most sociable people in the area and is well-respected for the work that he does.

loans.use: to expand his vegetable production.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es: El señor Fernando tiene 19 años de edad el vive en la Poblacion de Chimore, de la provincia Carrasco, del Municipio de Chimore, de la ciudad de Cochabamba, el sr Fernando trabaja realizando el servico de mecanica para moto taxi y la venta de repuestos que esta ubicado en en la zona florida s/n - calle panamericana el sr Fernando vivía en la Poblacion de senda F hace como dos años atras el tuvo que venirse a la poblacion de chimore porque no tuvo ingresos suficientes para poder mantener a su familia,  Fernando lo dejo a sus padres por lo que se vino a la poblacion de chimore, donde el se volvió a levantar junto a su esposa tomo un nuevo rumbo en su camino empezo de cero.  El préstamo que solicita Fernando es para la compra de un lote urbano y de esa manera podrá ayudar a su familia.
texts.en: Fernando is 19 years old. He lives in the community of Chimore in the province of Carrasco, municipality of Chimore, city of Cochabamba. Fernando works as a mechanic for motorcycle taxis and selling replacement parts in a area called Florida, on Calle Panamericana. Fernando used to live in the community of Senda F and about two years ago he had to come to Chimore because he didn't make enough income to support his family. Fernando left his parents when he came to live in Chimore, where with his wife he started a new life from zero. The loan Fernando is asking for is to buy a city lot and thus help his family.

loans.use: to buy a city lot

loans.name: Rema

texts.en:
Rema is 38 and managing her own business in Aparri. She has a small place allotted in the market where she sells different kinds of tires. This serves as her main source of income. She has been engaged in her business for more than ten months and earns approximately PHP 5,000 a month for this activity. 

At present, she is requesting a loan of PHP 25,000 to purchase tires and a stock of motor oils. She hopes for additional income this time, in order to save for her three children and as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase tires and a stock of motor oils to sell.

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is a 54-year-old mother, who engages in vegetable vending to supplement her husband's income. She aims to make the business profitable, in order to generate sufficient income to satisfy their needs and save money for future emergencies.

She plans to acquire more kinds of vegetables to sell, but she doesn't have enough capital. For this reason, she is asking for an additional capital of PHP 8,000. She will use the loan to buy vegetables to resell, such as okra, eggplant, tomatoes, string beans, pechay (bok choy), cabbage and bitter melon. Through this financial assistance, she is hoping that someday she will make the business viable and profitable.

loans.use: to buy produce to resell, such as okra, eggplant, tomatoes, string beans, pechay (bok choy), cabbage and bitter melon

loans.name: La Nueva Guardia Group

texts.es: El banco de emprendimiento LA NUEVA GUARDIA está compuesto por ocho integrantes, siete mujeres y un varón, la presidenta del banco es la Sra. Natalia tiene 36 años y dos hijos de las edades de, 9 y 17 años, ella se dedica  a la venta de comida, ella no tiene un puesto fijo, ya que entrega sus almuerzos a distintos puestos del mercado donde ella vende, la Sra. Natalia es una persona muy trabajadora  que con dedicación poco a poco va adquiriendo estabilidad y solvencia y también popularidad por que es muy conocida por sus clientes ya que la Sra. Natalia les atiende muy amablemente,  con el dinero del crédito comprara insumos para la elaboración de sus comidas como abarrotes y aceite por mayor, la cliente cuenta que con mucho esfuerzo se puede crecer más y así seguir haciéndose de patrimonio para el bienestar de su familia y también personal, el deseo de la Sra. Natalia es poder tener un puesto fijo ya que esto le haría crecer más en su negocio y por ende mejorar sus ingresos económicos, se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado a ella y a sus compañeras de grupo ya que son personas que trabajan mucho para salir adelante.
texts.en: The LA NUEVA GUARDIA communal bank is made up of eight members, seven ladies and one gentleman.  Natalia is the bank’s president.  She is 36 years old and has two children, ages 9 and 17.  She sells food but does not have a fixed stall, instead she delivers her lunches to different parts of the market where she sells.  Natalia is a hardworking lady who has acquired a stable life little by little and has also become popular because she is well known to her customers and provides them with very friendly service.  She will use the money from this loan to buy ingredients, such as  groceries and cooking oil in quantity to make her food.  She believes that she will be able to grow her business through her efforts and continue to be the parent for the well-being of her family and herself.  Natalia’s desire is to have a fixed food stall because this will help grow her business.  She is happy and grateful to the institution for the support given her and her fellow group members because they work hard to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en: Arlene, age 44, runs a general store business to earn an income. She has been engaged in her business for over six years and earns PHP 8,000 every month. She and her husband have two children and live in Bonifacio, Misamis Occidental. Arlene joined GDMPC in 2010 and has been a member in good standing ever since. She is requesting a loan in the amount of PHP 10,000, which she will use to purchase products like sugar, coffee, soap, shampoo, and canned goods to sell in her store. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from this investment to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase products like sugar, coffee, soap, shampoo, and canned goods to sell in her store

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay tuition for his children

loans.name: Osbaldo

texts.es: EL SEÑOR: OSBALDO VIVE EN EL SINDICATO PUERTO ICHILO, PERTENECIENTE AL DEPARTAMENTO DE  COCHABAMBA, PROVINCIA CARRASCO, MUNICIPIO ENTRE RIOS,  ACTUALMENTE VIVE CON SU HERMANO, ES SOLTERO Y NO TIENE HIJOS, ES MUY DEDICADO A SU ACTIVIDAD ECONOMICA, ES UN BUEN TRABAJADOR DE LA ZONA. TIENE EN PRODUCCION PIÑA Y ARROZ, DE ESTOS PRODUCTOS TIENE UNA COSECHA PROMEDIO ANUAL DE PIÑA (1/2 HA) 10000 UNIDADES Y ARROZ (1 1/2) 37 QQ.  LA VENTA DE PRODUCCTOS LA REALIZA EN EL MISMO LUGAR DE ORIGEN DE PRODUCTOS A LOS INTERMEDIARIOS QUE VIENEN A COMPRAR SU PRODUCTO AL LUGAR. EL  SEÑOR OSBALDO QUIERE AMPLIAR MAS SU PRODUCCION  Y CRECER MAS. RAZON POR LA CUAL  ESTA SOLICITANDO EL CREDITO PARA LA COMPRA DE UN LOTE AGRICOLA. DE ESTA MANERA TENDRA MAYOR DISPONIBILIDAD DE TERRENO PARA AMPLIAR SU  PRODUCCION.
texts.en:
Osbaldo lives in the township of Puerto Ichilo, which belongs to the department of Cochambamba in the province of Carrasco and in the municipality of Entre Rios.  He currently lives with his brother, is single, and does not have any children.  He is very dedicated to his economic activity, and he is a very good worker in the area.

He grows pineapple and rice.  He has an annual average harvest of 10,000 units of pineapple (from 1/2 hectare of land) and 37 quintals (about 3,700 lbs) of rice (from 1 1/2 hectares of land).  He sells his products in the same area where he grows them, and he sells to intermediaries that come to buy his products.  

Osbaldo wants to grow his production and business; this is the reason that he is requesting a loan in order to buy a plot of land.  In this way, he will have greater land available to him in order to grow his production.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land.

loans.name: Natiq

texts.en:
Natiq is 39 years old, with three children. He usually buys small cattle and raises and sells them. He has been in this business for eight years. His wife is a housewife who is helping in taking care of the house and helping Natiq's business.

Natiq sells meat in the bazaar. There is a big demand for meat because of the trade meals like dolma, kabab, etc. Natiq's income from business is AZN 400. He needs AZN 2,000 to buy five cattle. He hopes to make a good profit from this business.

Natiq is a good customer. This is his fourth loan. He believes that, with this loan, he can buy small cows and expand his business.

loans.use: to buy five cattle.

loans.name: 08-Pt2-12-Phú Sơn2 Group

texts.en:
Phương operates a food stall/restaurant selling sticky rice. She is requesting a loan to purchase rice and pork to cook sticky rice for resale.

Phương is 25 years old and she is married with one child. Phương is the group leader of the 08-Pt2-12-Phú Sơn2 solidarity group, which consists of six members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with one dependent.

This is Phương's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for three years. The main hardship that Phương faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Phương hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to buy land of her own, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase rice and pork to cook sticky rice for resale.

loans.name: 03.04.01- Quảng Hưng Group

texts.en:
Loan works in agriculture farming poultry and cattle. Loan has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main harship that Loan faces in her business is the lack of capital.

Loan is 61 years old and she is married with 3 children. Her children are grown up so Loan lives with no dependents in Thanh Hoa city, a urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

Loan is the group leader of the 03.04.01 solidarity group, which consists of 3 members. 

In 2011, Loan joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Loan has successfully repaid 3 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She is requesting a loan to purchase poultry and cattle for resale. With her business profit, Loan hopes for her children to find a good job, for her business to do well, and to travel for vacation within the country.

loans.use: to purchase poultry and cattle for resale.

loans.name: Filemon

texts.es: El señor Filemón tiene 32 años de edad,  tiene 4 hijos los cuales son dependientes de  sus ingresos, vive en la provincia cercado del  departamento de Cochabamba en la zona de Kara Kara, el señor vive en unos cuartos en alquiler, perseverante con sus metas, sus hijos son aun pequeños y  hace todo para poder sacarlas adelante con su trabajo que es de albañil, además se dedica a la prestación de servicios de taxi generalmente durante la noche que es cuando hay más trabajo. Su esposa se dedica a cuidar a los pequeños ya que son todos gemelos los mayores tienen 4 años y los otros dos 1 año, el motivo del presente crédito es para poder reparar y hacer un mantenimiento general a su vehículo y así seguir adelante con sus metas para beneficio de sus pequeños hijos.
texts.en:
Filemón is 32 years old, and has four children who depend on his income. He lives in the Kara Kara area of Cercado province, Cochabamba department.

He lives in some rented rooms, persevering toward his goals. His children are still small and he does everything to help them get ahead in life, through his work, which is construction. 

In addition he provides taxi services, generally during the night, which is when there is more work. His wife looks after the little ones as they are all twins: the eldest are 4 and the others 1. 

The purpose of this loan is so that he can repair and do general maintenance on his vehicle, and keep going toward his goals for the benefit of his little ones.

loans.use: To pay for repair and maintenance of his vehicle

loans.name: Ricardo Jacinto

texts.es:
El Señor Ricardo vive en Orquídeas, el tiene 46 años de edad.
Todo empezó cuando él se quedo sin trabajo y alquilo un auto para trabajarlo él, y de ahí en adelante se independizo.
El trabaja como taxista ejecutivo y trabaja solo, en horario indefinido. El inconveniente más frecuente que se le presenta en su trabajo son los ladrones. 

El si está casado su esposa no realiza ninguna actividad laboral.
 
El tiene 1 hijo que estudia en colegio particular.
El cliente usara el préstamo para arreglar su auto, para que este en mejores condiciones.
El desea en el futuro tener un taxi amarillo.
texts.en:
Sr. Ricardo is 46 years old and lives in Orquídeas. After he lost his job, he started this business by renting an automobile that he could use for his work. Since then, he has moved forward and become independent.

Ricardo works alone as a taxi driver. He keeps an indefinite schedule. The challenge he must face most frequently in his work is dealing with thieves. Ricardo is married and his wife is not employed. He has a son who is studying at a private school.

Ricardo will use this loan to repair his automobile so that it will be in better condition. In the future, he wants to have a yellow taxi.

loans.use: to pay for vehicle maintenance.

loans.name: Nizami

texts.en:
Nizami is 54 years old and a married man. He is a farmer and has raised seasonal fruits and vegetables for the last 5 years. He is very hard-working man and spends most of his time in the open air. His brother and wife help him. Nizami chose this business because it is profitable and fresh crops are in high demand. People use fresh vegetables and fruits every day and consider them healthy. 

Nizami sells fruits and vegetables in the bazaar. His monthly income from this business is 400AZN. He wants to expand his business and produce more fruits and vegetables to cover market demand and to increase his monthly income. For this purpose he applied for 1500 AZN. He will buy new garden tools, seeds and fertilizers. 

This will be his second loan and he has a good loan history. He is very optimistic about this loan as the previous one .

loans.use: to buy new garden tools, seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy embriodery material for her embriodery business.

loans.name: Eva

texts.en:
Eva is from Bonifacio, Misamis Occidental. She helps her family, by running a barber shop business. She’s a 49-year-old, married mom of three kids, who tries her best to earn income on her own. For 10 years, she has managed this business and earns about 8,000 PHP (Philippine pesos) per month.

For the time being, she’s in need of buying scissors, combs and other tools and supplies to use in her business. She joined GDMPC in 2011 and thanks GDMPC microfinance for the loan of 10,000 PHP they have provided to her. Eva desires to improve her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy scissors, combs and other tools and supplies to use in her business.

loans.name: Matluba

texts.ru: Матлюба добросовестная и честная женщина. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Дети совершеннолетние, но еще не имеют работу и источник дохода. Муж Матлюбы является учителем средней школы и получает маленькую зарплату. Дополнительно он занимается выращиванием сельхоз культуры. Матлюба решила организовать свой бизнес и таким образом помочь мужу для благо получения семьи. Она хочет организовать свой бизнес купле продажей скота, так как имеет опыт в этом виде бизнеса. Она обучилась в курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 сомони для покупки скота. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Matluba is a conscientious and honest woman. She is married and has 2 kids who are now adults, but who have not yet found employment. Her husband is a high school teacher and earns a small salary. He also grows crops. Matluba has decided to start her own business to help her husband provide for the family. She wants to get into buying and selling cattle because she has experience in this field. She took a course entitled "To Get Ahead" that was organised by the Association of Businesswomen, and for which she received a certificate. Matluba is seeking a loan of 1,000 Tajikistan Somoni to purchase cattle. She is waiting for your kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle to set up a new business

loans.name: 03.04.03 - Quảng Hưng Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Dậu works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. Dậu has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that she faces in her business is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase poultry and cattle to raise and resell in the future.

In 2011, Dậu joined Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women (FPW) to improve her business. She has successfully repaid three previous loans from FPW. Dậu is the group leader of the 03.04.03 - Quảng Hưng solidarity group, which is comprised of three members. 

Dậu is 56 years old and she is married, and has three children. Two of her children are grown up, so Dậu lives with one dependent, in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province. With her business profit, Dậu hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to find a good job, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase poultry and cattle, which she will raise and resell in the future

loans.name: Rosario Del Carmen

texts.es:
Rosario es una mujer de 37 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Parcona, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por salir adelante; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la  necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Rosario no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, en sus ratos libres le gusta distraerse viendo televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pallares para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Rosario trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda  a sus clientes.
Rosario se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mayor cantidad y variedad de prendas de vestir para abastecer su negocio, ahora ella puede atender a mas clientes, así pues Rosario seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su propio puesto de ventas en el mercado central de su ciudad.
texts.en:
Rosario is 37 years old and lives in the city of Ica, in the district of Parcona.  She is a very kind, hardworking and enthusiastic person who devotes all of her efforts to get ahead.  Unfortunately, due to lack of financial resources and the need to work at a very young age, Rosario was not able to study for a professional degree.  In her spare time she enjoys watching TV, and at times she cooks the rich "Rice with Lima Beans" dish to share with her family.

At her own initiative, and with a lot of commitment and dedication, Rosario works in her small business selling clothing.  She works every day for about 10 hours, and she believes that the business is doing well because of her good prices and because of the friendly service she provides to her customers.  

Rosario is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because thanks to the help that they are providing, she will be able to buy a large quantity and variety of garments to stock up her business.  Now she will be able to serve more customers, and so in this way Rosario will continue to work and exert herself in order to achieve her greatest dream: to have her own sales stall in the central market of her city.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (clothing)

loans.name: Jinky

texts.en:
Jinky is from the Northern region, which is famous for agriculture products. The best agricultural business for the locals is raising hogs, and some limited land cultivation. Jinky is engaged in fattening pigs. She keeps one mother pig and six little pigs. This is the only source of income for their young family, so she and her husband work hard to raise the pigs and earn income from the sales.

As the farm is small and their income is hardly enough for covering daily costs, Jinky has applied for this loan. The money from the loan will be used to expand the farm, by purchasing two piglets and feed. She dreams of having a big farm and improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase two piglets and feed.

loans.name: Gondelina

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Gondelina works hard to support her family. She has a business selling soft drinks and other beverages in the Philippines, and she earns additional income from fish vending and keeping a general store. 

Gondelina is borrowing PHP 26,000 through NWTF. She will use the loan to buy additional stock of soft drinks and other beverages to resell.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her past 20 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream -- to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional soft drinks and other beverages to resell

loans.name: Galo Lorenzo

texts.es:
El Señor Galo vive en La Libertad, ella tiene 50 años de edad. El comenzó a vender pollo asado, para tener ingresos en su hogar para ayudar a su esposa con los gastos,  y como le fue bien se puso un asadero.

El realiza su trabajo con su esposa y lo hace todos los días de la semana. Los inconvenientes que se le presentan en  trabajo son los ladrones de su comunidad. El está casado y la esposa es costurera. El no tiene hijos.

Con el préstamo el comprara materiales para su negocio como: pollo, colas, jugos, arroz, etc. El desea poder tener un lugar de pollo asado muy reconocido para así tener ingresos económicos para su familia.
texts.en:
Sr. Galo is 50 years old and lives in La Libertad. He began selling roasted chickens so that he could generate household income and help his wife with the expenses. Galo has done very well since opening his rotisserie shop.

He and his wife work together every day of the week. The challenges they face in their business include dealing with thieves in the community. Galo is married and his wife is a seamstress. He has no children.

With this loan, Galo will buy supplies for his business such as chicken, colas, juices, rice, and other items. He wants to have a roasted chicken establishment that is well-known so that he can generate income for his family.

loans.use: to buy chicken, colas, juices, rice, and other supplies for his rotisserie shop.

loans.name: Vergenia

texts.en:
Vergenia is 36 years old, married, and has four children. She lives in Bonifacio, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a farmland, planting and harvesting coconut for sale in the local community, to earn a living. She has been in her business for over six years and earns 8,000 PHP every month.

She  joined GDMPC this year, to gain access to credit for her business. And now she has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP, which she will use to purchase fertilizers, such as manure. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business, to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, such as manure

loans.name: Seidasad

texts.en:
Seidasad is 53 years old. He lives in Ganjala village, Lagodekhi district, with his 48-year-old wife, Shapika. Seidasad requested a loan from local financial institutions several times for a family business start-up, but without any success. His loan request was rejected all the time, because of low income and the family’s poor living conditions. 

The family runs an agricultural business. In particular, they have a greenhouse. Seidasad cultivates the land and plants vegetables and greens. The harvested products are sold locally at the markets, and the family gets a small monthly income which is rarely enough to cover their daily expenses.

Seidasad requested a loan from Credo to start up a family business. His loan request was approved in the framework of a new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages provision of business start-up and re-start-up credits with soft conditions to the country’s rural poor, who do not have access to credit products, being regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of low income. 

With the received credit, Seidasad will purchase calves. He will grow them and later sell them at a profit. He will use part of the profit for reinvesting and developing their farming business and another part for providing better living conditions for him and his wife.

loans.use: to purchase calves, grow them, and later sell them at a profit.

loans.name: Justa

texts.en:
Justa is seventy years old and married with seven children. For the past twenty years she has run a general store in the Philippines where she sells a variety of items such as canned goods, soft drinks, snack foods and other groceries. She works very hard to provide for her family.

Justa is applying for a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell such as those noted above. Her aim is to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell in her store.

loans.name: Eliza Rachiel

texts.en:
Eliza Rachiel is a 23-year-old, married woman from Ubay, Bohol. She has two children. The oldest is four, and the youngest is three years old. She engages in a farming business. She raises rice. She has been in this business for five years. This is the source of her income. Her husband is a farmer, too.

Eliza is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer. This will help her to make her rice grow fast. By the help of this loan, she will be able to buy fertilizer so that her rice plants will grow fast and she can harvest in a short period of time. Eliza hopes to expand her business, in the future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her rice crop

loans.name: Alicia Natalia

texts.es:
La Señora Alicia vive en La Libertad, ella tiene 60 años de edad. La clienta empezó con una pequeña tienda que la manejaba con la ayuda del esposo, pero luego al quedar viuda vio la necesidad de buscar otro sustento así que entro a un programa que  ayudan a costureras, formando así su propio taller, colaborado con asociación comunal y ahora hace uniformes de escuelas y colegio.

Ella tiene un taller de sastrería y una tienda, en la cual  trabaja con la ayuda de sus hijas, desde las 8:00 de la mañana hasta las 22:00 de la noche. Ella es viuda, Tiene hijas pero son ya mayores de edad y están casados.

Con el préstamo ella va a comprar telas para la confección de pantalones y camisetas. Ella desea con el tiempo poder comprar las maquinas adecuadas que necesita en su negocio.
texts.en:
Sra. Alicia is 60 years old and lives in La Libertad. She manages a small store that she started with the help of her husband. After her husband died, Alicia needed to find another source of income, so she enrolled in a program that helps seamstresses start their own workshops. She partnered with a community association and now she makes uniforms for elementary and high schools.

Alicia manages both her tailoring shop and her store. With the help of her daughters, she works from 8:00 A.M. to 10:00 P.M. Alicia is a widow. Her daughters are grown and married.

With this loan, Alicia will buy fabrics for making trousers and T-shirts. Over time, she wants to buy adequate machines that she needs for her business.

loans.use: to buy fabrics for making trousers and T-shirts.

loans.name: Salam

texts.en:
Salam is a 23-year-old conservative lady. She asked her mother to appear in the photo instead. 

Salam is a single lady who has previously applied for an educational loan. Now she is applying for a new youth loan to support her family’s business selling water bottles and soda drinks to smaller shops, by buying another distributing car to expand their business.

loans.use: to buy another distributing car.

loans.name: Alizamin

texts.en:
Alizamin 44 years old, married, and has three children. His wife is a homemaker. Alizamin is a popular merchant in his home town, because his shop is located in the center. It is already 10 years that he has been selling food products. From this business his profit is 400 AZN monthly. He sells food products such as macaroni, rice, candies, cookies, sugar and beverages in his shop. His son also helps him in this business.  

The profit he earns is not enough to reinvest in his business and to cover customers` demand, so he is suffering for this reason. Being the main source of income, his profit is used for family needs. Alizamin would like to increase his sales and invest additional capital in the business. For this purpose, he applied for a 2,000 AZN loan. He will purchase and diversify foodstuffs to sell at his store. This will be his fourth loan, and he has a good credit history.

loans.use: to increase his sales and invest additional capital, by diversifying the foodstuffs he offers

loans.name: Gresilda

texts.en:
Gresilda is a 42-year-old, married woman and a mother of three grown-up children. Gresilda and her husband have been engaged in a fishing business for almost 15 years now. This is the source of their income. 

Gresilda needs a loan for the renovation of their house. She is asking for a loan to purchase materials for house renovation, like cement, sand, wood, and nails. In the future, Gresilda dreams of expanding their fishing business, so that it will generate more revenue to meet their needs and expenses.

loans.use: to purchase materials for house renovation, like cement, sand, wood, and nails.

loans.name: Diogenes

texts.es: Don Diógenes, tiene 21 años de edad, su familia está compuesta por cinco miembros tres hermanos y los dos padres, es una familia humilde de escasos recursos económicos, viven en la comunidad de Taboada del municipio de Mizque, del departamento de Cochabamba. Trabaja en la agricultura y la pecuaria, produce cebolla, frejol y papa; los comercializa en el mismo lugar donde vive a los comerciantes de la misma población de Mizque. Don Diógenes es una persona muy respetada en su comunidad, por la dedicación a su trabajo y por ser el responsable de la alimentación y la educación de su familia. Tienen una vivienda de paredes de adobe, techo de caña-hueca y revoque de barro, Don Diógenes, está solicitando el crédito para comprar semillas, abonos y agroquímicos  y mejorar las condiciones de vida de toda su familia.
texts.en:
Sr, Diógenes is 21 years old. There are five people in his family, three children and their two parents. They are a simple family with very little money who live in the community of Taboada in the municipality of Mizque, in Cochabamba department. Diógenes works in agriculture and also raises cattle. He grows onions, beans, and potatoes which he sells locally to businesses in Mizque. He is very well respected in the community for his dedication to his work and his sense of responsibility to the care and education of his family. 

He and his family live in an adobe house with a bamboo roof and mud-covered walls. Diógenes is seeking a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, and chemical supplies for his fields. He hopes to improve the standard of living of his whole family.

loans.use: Buy seeds (onion, bean, potato) and chemical and organic fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a buffalo.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: La Sra. María es una persona muy sencilla y trabajadora, ella tiene 31 años de edad, no es casada pero vive hace ya 3 años en concubinato, con su actual pareja tiene 2 hijos,  uno de 3 años y otro de 6 meses de edad, a los cuales apoya con todo esmero; ella solo sabe leer y escribir por qué estudio hasta la primaria y no pudo continuar con sus estudios por problemas económico y personales así que se dedicó a la  agricultura, son ya casi 15 años que se dedica a esta actividad, María siembra papa en los terrenos de sus padres, es una buena producción y genera buenos ingresos, la razón de este nuevo crédito es que por motivo de su embarazo no pudo sembrar la anterior temporada y no provisiono semilla para esta nueva temporada así que necesita comprar la semilla y empezar de nuevo con la producción y así mejorar su calidad de vida y seguir apoyando a sus pequeños hijos y salir adelante como familia.
texts.en:
Sra. Maria is a very hardworking and unassuming person. She is 31 years old and unmarried. However for the past three years she has been living with a partner. She has two children with her current partner: a three year old and a baby, six months old, both of whom she takes very good care of. She knows how to read and write because she has a primary education however she was unable to continue studying because of economic and personal problems. Consequently she has devoted herself to farming and has been a farmer for almost 15 years.

Maria cultivates potatoes on her parents’ land and has a good yield, which generates a good income. The reason for this new loan is that she was unable to plant during the previous season due to her pregnancy and therefore does not have a store of seeds for this new season. Therefore she needs to purchase seed to start producing anew so that she can improve her quality of life and continue to support her small children and help her family get ahead.

loans.use: to purchase potato seed.

loans.name: Esmeralda

texts.en:
Esmeralda has been engaged in a fishing business together with her husband for more than 30 years now. She lives with her family in CPG, Bohol. Esmeralda works hard to support her husband in their fishing business. 

Esmeralda is asking for a loan to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and buckets. With this, her husband will be able to improve his catch, thus giving them more fish to sell in the market. 

Esmeralda hopes to make their business successful and sustainable. Moreover, she wants to save money for the school expenses of her children and to repay her loan on time.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and buckets.

loans.name: Tehran

texts.en:
Tehran is 42 years old, married and has four children. He is an IDP (internally displaced person) and lives with his family in Bilasuvar IDP Settlement. He receives 60 AZN in monthly financial support from the government. He breeds sheep for their wool and meat, selling the latter to local butchers and makes 120 AZN a month. His wife is a cleaner whose salary is very low. Altogether, this amount is too low to cover his family’s needs.

Tehran has more than fifteen years of experience in livestock breeding, thanks to his father who taught him the best ways to look after sheep. He usually buys lambs, raises and fattens them in four to five months, then sells them at a profit at the local livestock bazaar.

In Azerbaijan people use meat in everyday national dishes such as pilau and dolmas and always use yoghurt for a sauce. Mutton is considered to be part of a healthy daily diet, while wool is used by local women to make blankets and bed mattresses.

Tehran is applying for a 1,500 AZN loan through Aqroinvest to buy thirteen sheep plus fodder for them. This will be his second loan, and he has a good client history.

loans.use: to buy thirteen sheep plus fodder for them.

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
Mary Ann is 48 years old, separated, and has three children. She lives in Bonifacio, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a retail business, which is a school supplies store in the local community, to earn a living. She has been in her business for over six years and earns 8,000 PHP every month.

She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP. She will use it to purchase additional products to sell, such as school supplies. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business, to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell, such as school supplies

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is 41 years old and a married man, who has two children. He is an IDP and lives with his family in Bilasuvar IDP Settlement. He breeds sheep for wool, and to sell to local butchers for meat. Ahmad has more than 10 years of experience in this field. His wife is a housekeeper. He receives 80 AZN financial support from government monthly (as an IDP), but this is too low to cover family needs.

Ahmad usually buys lambs, raises and fattens them in 4-5 months, and resells them for a profitable price in the local livestock bazaar.  His monthly income from this activity is 130 AZN. People use meat in everyday national dishes, such as pilau and dolma, and always use yoghurt sauce. Mutton is considered very healthy and is also present in everyday life. Wool is very useful for blankets and bed mattresses, made by local women.    

This is the main financial income in his family.  Ahmad applied for a loan of 1,500 AZN, which he will use to purchase 15 sheep. This will be his third loan, and he has a good client history.

loans.use: to buy 15 sheep

loans.name: Gulshan

texts.en:
Gulshan, a 27-year-old married mother of two, is an IDP who lives in the Bilasuvar IDP Settlement. She receives 80 AZN in financial support from the government monthly, but this is too low to cover their expenses. Gulshan was a housewife, but because her husband`s salary was too low to meet the family's needs, she decided to start breeding cattle five years ago.

Gulshan usually buys small calves, raising and fattening them for five to six months, then selling them for profit in the livestock bazaar. Meat is in very high demand in Azerbaijan, and people use it in everyday dishes like pilau and dolma. Her monthly income is 200 AZN, and this business is the main source of income in her family.

Gulshan has requested a 1500 AZN loan to purchase two head of cattle and one milking cow. She wants to expand her business and improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy two head of cattle and one milking cow.

loans.name: Nahid

texts.en:
Nahid is a 27-year-old man, married, with one son. He is an Internally Displaced Person and received financial support from the government, which is AZN 60. 

For the last five years, Nahid has been a market vendor, selling different kinds of food products, like macaroni, sugar, tea, candies, and cookies. He is a trusted client of Aqroinvest Credit Union and started his business with our loan. He is a very successful market vendor and during these years of experience he was able to save enough money to build his own market and stop spending money to rent. In the picture, Nahid is next to his newly-bought place which he is renovating for a new shop.

Nahid's monthly income is AZN 350 and he believes that it will increase after he finishes the renovation. He applied for an AZN 1,500 loan for this purpose and he promises to pay back, as he did before. Aqroinvest Credit Union trusts Nahid because he always paid on time.

loans.use: to make renovations to his new shop.

loans.name: Wilson Manuel

texts.es: El señor Wilson Manuel tiene 29 años, es soltero, vive en una casa alquilada en la provincia de Monteagudo, trabaja de profesor de educación primaria y desempeña sus actividades en la unidad educativa de la comunidad de San Miguel del Bañado, que está ubicado a 40 km de la ciudad de Sucre. Obtiene ingresos como profesor y también por el transporte de pasajeros que realiza diariamente en su taxi de la provincia Monteagudo a la provincia de San Miguel. El diario vivir de Wilson es muy agotador ya que además de cumplir con sus obligaciones como profesor debe trabajar en su tiempo libre viajando para que de esta manera obtenga ingresos suficientes para alimentarse, vestirse, pagar alquiler de vivienda y otros gasto que tiene. El señor Wilson Manuel está solicitando el crédito para realizar mantenimiento general  a su taxi para así seguir trasladándose a su fuente de trabajo y también continuar con el transporte de pasajeros, de esta manera  generara ingresos que le ayuden a mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Wilson Manuel, 29, is single living in a rented house in Monteagudo Province.  He works as an elementary school teacher and carries out his activities in a school in the community of San Miguel del Bañado located 40 kilometers from the city of Sucre.  He earns income as a teacher but also by providing passenger taxi transportation services daily between the Monteagudo and San Miguel provinces.  

Wilson’s daily routine is very exhausting because in addition to meeting his obligations as a teacher he must work during his free time traveling so that he can earn enough income to feed and dress himself as well as pay rent and cover other expenses he has.

Wilson Manuel is requesting the loan to do general maintenance on his taxi so that he can continue getting to his place of work and also continue transporting passengers thus earning income that will help him improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to service and repair his car.

loans.name: George

texts.en: George is managing an eatery for a living. He aims to increase his profit, because he would like to have more comfortable living conditions and improve his financial stability. He wants to buy meat, rice, soft drinks and vegetables, to ensure the proper growth of his income. But his funds are inadequate, so he decided to apply for a loan amounting to PHP 20,000. He hopes that his business will create a greater income, which will enable him to acquire financial stability.

loans.use: to buy meat, rice, soft drinks and vegetables

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita, 34 years old, is married and has been blessed with six children. She's been into selling medicines in her village for almost 12 years. With this business she's earning a net income of PHP 5,000.

She would like to take a loan amounting to PHP 15,000. She will use the loan to purchase branded and generic medicines. She's hoping that her requested loan will be granted, so that she can be able to invest her loan in her business, to gain more income.

loans.use: To purchase branded and generic medicines

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: EL SEÑOR CARLOS DE 55 AÑOS DE EDAD,  CASADO, VIVE JUNTO A SU FAMILIA QUE SON DE ESCASOS RECURSOS ECONÓMICOS. CARLOS SE DEDICA EXCLUSIVAMENTE A LA AGRICULTURA Y EN SU TIEMPO LIBRE TRABAJA COMO JORNALERO EN DIFERENTES PARCELAS DE SU COMUNIDAD PARA ASÍ PODER MANTENER A SU FAMILIA. EN LA ANTERIOR COSECHA TUVO PROBLEMAS CLIMÁTICOS  DE SEQUÍA, CAUSANDO UNA MALA PRODUCCIÓN Y  UNA BAJA CALIDAD EN SUS PRODUCTOS LO CUAL REDUJO SUS  INGRESOS ECONÓMICOS. CADA AÑO PRODUCEN PRINCIPALMENTE CEBOLLA, PAPA  Y FREJOL.  ESTE AÑO CARLOS QUIERE EMPEZAR CON EL PIE DERECHO Y  TENER UNA BUENA PRODUCCIÓN EN SUS CULTIVOS ES  POR ESO QUE ESTA SOLICITANDO EL CRÉDITO PARA COMPRAR ABONO ORGÁNICO Y ABONO QUÍMICO, PARA QUE DE ESTA MANERA MEJORE LA PRODUCCIÓN DE CEBOLLA Y PAPA. EL SEÑOR CARLOS TRABAJA EN PEQUEÑAS PARCELAS CON SU ESPOSA, TAMBIÉN TIENE LA CLARA IDEA DE QUE CON ESTE CRÉDITO MEJORARÁ LAS CONDICIONES DE SUS CULTIVOS Y TAMBIÉN MEJORAR LAS CONDICIONES DE VIDA DE SU FAMILIA.
texts.en:
Carlos, 55, is married living with his family which is of scarce economic resources.  Carlos works exclusively in agriculture and in his free time works as a day laborer in various parcels in his community in order to be able to support his family.

He had problems in the previous planting cycle due to drought which led to poor harvests and low quality products that in turn led to a drop in income.  He grows mainly onions, potatoes and broad beans every year.  This year, Carlos wants to start out on the right foot and have good crop yields which is why he’s requesting this loan to buy organic manure and chemical fertilizer so that onion and potato production will improve.

Carlos works with his wife on small parcels and has a clear idea of how this loan will help improve the condition of his crops as well as his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy organic manure and chemical fertilizer.

loans.name: Emerita

texts.en:
Emerita is a 44-year-old married woman from Garcia, Bohol. She has five children, the oldest being 24 and the youngest, nine. For the past ten years she has run a sari-sari, or variety store, where she sells such things as snacks, noodles, canned goods, sugar, milk and coffee.

Emerita is applying for a 5000 PHP loan through CEVI to buy additional items to sell like canned goods, noodles, toiletries, snacks, coffee, sugar and spices. Emerita’s ambition is to see her business grow.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell from her shop.

loans.name: Oruj

texts.en:
Oruj is a friendly and hardworking man of 43 years old. He is married and has three children. He is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person) and lives with his family in the Bilasuvar IDP Settlement.  He breeds cattle and has 15 years of experience in this field. Oruj gets financial support from the government, but 60 AZN is too small an amount to cover the family’s needs. 

Cattle-breeding requires a lot of physical activity and spending most of the time in the open air. Pasturing takes 80% of Oruj`s time. He usually buys small calves, raises and fattens them for 5-6 months, and then resells them for a more profitable price in the livestock bazaar. His monthly income is 140 AZN, and this business is only one source of financial income in his family. Meat is in very high demand in Azerbaijan, and people use it in everyday dishes like pilau and dolma. 

Oruj would like to purchase five cattle, and for this purpose he applied for 1,500 AZN. He needs this loan to increase the monthly turnover and cover the needs of his customers. He has already completed several loans with AqroInvest and has a positive client history.

loans.use: to buy five cattle

loans.name: Maribel Carola

texts.es: La señora  Maribel Carola tiene 27 años de edad,   tiene una hija Carla de 4 años la cual es dependiente de ella, el padre de la niña les abandono hace dos años, no sabe nada del padre de su hija ya que emigro a España.  La señora  Maribel Carola vive en la provincia cercado de Cochabamba, en la zona de la Maica, dicha zona se caracteriza por ser un sector que se dedica a la actividad lechera.  La señora  Maribel Carola se dedica a la producción de leche, cuenta con 15 vacas lecheras de las cuales 8 se encuentran en producción, 4 se hallan preñadas y 3 se encuentran secas.  Todas las vacas con las que cuenta son el esfuerzo de 10 años de dedicación en esta actividad; el motivo del presente crédito es para la compra de alimento ''cascara de soya'' ya que necesita para la alimentación de su ganado lechero, ya que al comprar por mayor (una camionada)  se reduce el costo de dicho insumo.
texts.en:
Maribel Carola, 27, has a four-year-old daughter, Carla, who depends on her; her daughter’s father abandoned them two years ago and she has no knowledge of him since he emigrated to Spain.

Maribel Carola lives in the Maica zone of Cochabamba’s Cercado province.  This zone is noted for being an area where dairy farming is common.  Maribel Carola is a dairy farmer; she has 15 dairy cows 8 of which are producing, four are pregnant and 3 that are not lactating.  All of the cows she has are the result of ten years’ efforts dedicated to this activity.

The reason for the present loan is to buy soybean husks which is needed to feed her dairy cows since by purchasing it at wholesale (by the truckload) costs are reduced.

loans.use: to buy soybean husks.

loans.name: Khishigdelger

texts.en:
Mrs. Khishigdelger, 29 years old, lives with her husband, daughter and parents in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She has been working as a saleswoman at a trade center since 2010. Her husband has been rendering taxi services to local people for a long time and has accumulated a vast amount of experience in this service. 

Using her previous loan, Khishigdelger has added an extension and insulation to her house. Now she is requesting a loan of 2,000,000 MNT to install a heating system in her house. Installment of the heating system will enable the family to live in a more comfortable and warm place, as well as burn less coal, emit less smoke, and then contribute to the efforts against air pollution. 

Khishigdelger is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to install a heating system in her house.

loans.name: Maria Fe

texts.en:
Maria Fe is 48 years old and married with four children. She lives in Bonifacio, Misamis Occidental. 

Maria Fe owns and operates farmland, planting and harvesting rice for sale in the local community to earn a living. She has been in her business for over eight years and earns 25,000 PHP every month. 

She has been a member of GDMPC since the year 2010, and now she has requested a loan of 30,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure. Maria Fe plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure.

loans.name: Venera

texts.en:
Venera is 62 years old and a retired woman. She lives alone in Zemo Khandaki village, Kaspi district. Venera requested a loan from local financial institutions several times, for a business start-up, but without any success. Her loan request was rejected all the time, because of low income and poor living conditions.
 
Venera owns a small plot of agricultural land. On the land she grows haricots and onions. Harvested products are sold locally at the markets. Her additional income is a small monthly pension.

Recently, Venera requested a loan from Credo to start up a business. Her loan request was approved, in the frame of a new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The Start-up loan program envisages provision of business start-up and restart-up credits, with soft conditions, to rural poor people, who do not have access to other credit products, being regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of low income.

With the received credit, Venera will purchase materials to start sewing bedclothing. She used to be in this business a few years ago. As Venera is already experienced, and her fellow villagers know this, she will have good numbers of clients and will work from her house. The new business, financed with the Kiva Start-up loan, will bring Venera good profit, which she wants to use for developing her agricultural business. The increased income will significantly improve her living conditions, as well.

loans.use: To purchase materials to start a business, sewing bedclothing

loans.name: Isauro

texts.es: EL SEÑOR ISAURO,  TIENE 39 AÑOS DE EDAD, CASADO,  TIENE 6 HIJOS DEPENDIENTES, SE DEDICA A LA ACTIVIDAD ECONÓMICA AGRÍCOLA JUNTO A SU FAMILIA, SE ENCUENTRA A UNA DISTANCIA DE 5 KM DE LA POBLACIÓN DE MIZQUE DONDE EXISTE CENTROS EDUCATIVOS, PARA RECIBIR LA EDUCACIÓN PRIMARIA LOS HIJOS TIENEN QUE RECORRER TODOS LOS DÍAS A PIE, EN ALGUNOS CASOS EN MOVILIDAD QUE PODRÍA ESTAR TRANSCURRIENDO ESA RUTA, POR TENER TANTOS HIJOS QUE MANTENER Y CORRER CON TODOS LOS GASTOS DON ISAURO TRABAJA HASTA POR LAS NOCHES EN LOS CULTIVOS PARA DISMINUIR LOS COSTOS DE PRODUCCIÓN, POR  LAS CONTINUAS LLUVIAS REGISTRADAS EN LA ZONA DURANTE EL MES DE FEBRERO 2013 DON ISAURO HA SUFRIDO LA SATURACIÓN HÍDRICA Y DESBORDES DE LOS RÍOS OCASIONANDO A LAS PARCELAS PRODUCTIVAS DE PAPA LA PUDRICIÓN DEL CULTIVO Y A UNA BUENA PARTE DE LA PROPIEDAD, POR EFECTO UNA DISMINUCIÓN DE INGRESOS ECONÓMICOS,  POR ESTOS MOTIVOS MENCIONADOS LA ESTABILIDAD ECONÓMICA HA SUFRIDO UN DESEQUILIBRIO AFECTANDO DIRECTAMENTE EN LA ADQUISICIÓN DE LOS MATERIALES E INSUMOS REQUERIDOS PARA LA PRODUCCIÓN AGRÍCOLA Y  LA EDUCACIÓN DE SUS HIJOS, PARA ENMENDAR LO MENCIONADO ANTERIORMENTE HA RECURRIDO AL CRÉDITO CON EL OBJETIVO DE MEJORAR LA CALIDAD DE VIDA Y ESTABILIZAR LAS NECESIDADES ECONÓMICAS DE LA FAMILIA Y RETOMAR EL CAMINO DE LA PROSPERIDAD.
texts.en:
Isauro is 39 years old, married, and has six dependent children. He farms with his family and lives 5 km from the village of Mizque, where there are schools. To receive primary education children have to travel every day on foot, in some cases in vehicles which could be traveling that route. 

Because he has so many children to support and to meet all the expenses, Isauro even works nights in his fields to reduce production costs. 

Because of the continuous rains recorded in the area during the month of February 2013, Isauro has suffered from water saturation and overflowing of the rivers, resulting in spoilage of his potato crop on his productive parcels and losses to a good part of his property. This has resulted in a reduction of his income. For these reasons, his financial stability has suffered a setback, directly affecting the acquisition of materials and supplies needed for his farming and the education of the children. 

To deal with the above-mentioned he has has turned to credit, with the aim of improving his quality of life, stabilizing his family's financial situation and returning to the road to prosperity.

loans.use: To buy organic fertilizer and agricultural chemicals.

loans.name: Michael

texts.es: Michael nació en la provincia Carrasco, tiene 20 años de edad, termino el colegio con bastantes esfuerzos  trabajando y estudiando al mismo tiempo, a pesar delas dificultades al egresar del colegio fue a la ciudad de Santa cruz a buscar trabajo. Michael trabajo aproximadamente por un año en diferentes actividades, actualmente vive en Cochabamba trabaja con su tío con las artesanías de Cemento, los trabajos que realiza son decorativos para el hogar como ser: macetas, estatuas de cemento, fuentes de agua. Michael aprendió con facilidad el trabajo de artesanias de cemento, actualmente sigue trabajando en el rubro, gana por producto terminado. En los últimos años Michel busca mejorar su calidad de vida con un ambiente propio para vivir, por esta razón solicita un crédito para la compra de un lote urbano en la comunidad de Paraíso, esto con la finalidad de a futuro construir su propia vivienda.
texts.en:
Michael, 20, was born in Carrasco Province.  He completed school with much effort working and studying at the same time.  Despite difficulties, when he graduated from school he went to the city of Santa Cruz seeking employment.  Michael worked for about a year in various activities and he currently lives in Cochabamba working with his uncle making cement crafts.  He makes decorative items for the home like flower pots, cement statues and water fountains.  Michael learned to make cement crafts easily and he’s currently still in this line of work.  He earns by the finished item.

Michael has been seeking ways to improve his quality of life these past few years with a dwelling of his own to live in and this is why he’s requesting the loan to buy an urban lot in the community of Paraíso with the intention of building his own house in the future.

loans.use: to buy an urban lot.

loans.name: Savino

texts.es: El señor sabino de 32 años de edad,  soltero, vive junto a su familia y su hijo,  la madre de su hijo les abandono, quedando al cuidado de su hijo, son de escasos recursos económicos. Sabino se dedica exclusivamente a la agricultura y en tiempos libres trabaja como jornalero en diferentes parcelas de su comunidad para así poder mantener a su familia, este año por época de lluvias el rio avasalló una gran parte de su terreno y de sus cultivos donde producía frejol, quedando completamente destrozado y sin ninguna posibilidad de rescatar algo  de la producción, esto hiso que sus ingresos económicos bajen considerablemente y no logre cubrir con los gastos que tiene para mantener a su familia y los gastos en los que incurre por la producción agrícola que cada año produce principalmente frejol y maní.  Ahora el Sr. Sabino está solicitando el crédito para comprar semillas y abonos y de esta manera volver a retomar el camino de la producción agrícola. El  Sr. Sabino trabaja en pequeñas parcelas, también tiene la clara idea de que con este crédito mejorará las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Sabino, 32, is single living with his family and son.  His son’s mother abandoned them leaving him to care for their son; they are of scarce economic resources.  

Sabino works exclusively in agriculture and in his free time works as a day laborer in different parcels in his community in order to support his family.  This year due to the heavy rainfall the river overran its banks flooding part of his land where he was growing broad beans completely destroying it and leaving no possibility of salvaging any part of his harvest.  This caused his income to drop considerably and he was unable to cover costs to support his family and costs incurred in his yearly agricultural production mainly of broad beans and peanuts.

Now, Sabino is requesting the loan to buy seeds and manure to once again retake the agricultural production path.  He has a clear idea that with this loan he’ll be able to improve his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy potato and broad bean seeds and to buy organic manure.

loans.name: Shirin

texts.en:
Shirin, 42, is married and has three children. He is an IDP (internally displaced person) and lives with his family in Bilasuvar IDP Settlement. He breeds cattle to sell to local butchers and raises cows for their milk and milk products. He also raises sheep for their meat. His work is his family’s only income.

Shirin has fifteen years of experience with livestock, thanks to his father who taught him the best way to look after his animals. He usually buys young cattle, raises and fattens them for five to six months and then sells them at a profit in the local livestock bazaar. He also sells milk and yoghurt to his neighbors. Altogether, these activities brings in 250 AZN a month but is not enough to cover the basic needs of his beloved children.

Milk and yoghurt as well as beef and mutton are very popular in Azerbaijan. People use meat in everyday national dishes such as pilau and dolmas and always use yoghurt as a sauce. Milk products are considered to be very healthy and are also present in everyday life.

Shirin is applying for a 1500 AZN loan through Agroinvest to buy three head of cattle, one milk cow plus some fodder. This will be his fourth loan, and he has a good client history.

loans.use: to buy three head of cattle, one milk cow plus some fodder.

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud, 35, is married and the father of four children. He has a small shop where he sells mobile phones and accessories such as phone covers, headphones and wireless headsets. He works nonstop to provide for his family.

Mahmoud set up shop in 2010 and has gained good experience in this field. He is well-known in his neighborhood as a generous person because he provides free phone maintenance for his clients.

Mahmoud is applying for a loan of 3,000 USD through ACSI Iraq to renovate his shop and install a rolling shutter. His aim is to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his children with a better life.

loans.use: to renovate his shop and install a rolling shutter.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy goats and sheep for her husband's meat-selling business

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es: El señor Oscar tiene 36 años de edad, vive con su esposa y tiene 5 hijos menores, de los cuales 4 se encuentran estudiando en la escuela de la Comunidad, su domicilio está ubicado en el Cantón Ticucha del Municipio de Muyupampa en la comunidad de Cumandayti. La principal actividad de Oscar es la fabricación de trabajos en madera como, catres, mesas, sillas, bancos y roperos; que lo fabrica en su pequeño taller de carpintería con motores estacionarios que tiene, debido que en el lugar no se cuenta con energía eléctrica. Oscar trabaja arduamente para mantener a sus hijos que están estudiando para que ellos puedan continuar sus estudios secundarios y tener una mejor vida. Está solicitando crédito para la compra de motor estacionario, compra de una maquina tupí, combustible y así fabricar más muebles, para que así pueda incrementar sus ingresos lo que les ayudara a cubrir los estudios de sus hijos
texts.en: Oscar, 36, lives with his wife and has five children under the age of 18. Four of them are studying at a school in the community. His home is located in Ticucha canton, Muyupampa municipality, Cumandayti community. Oscar's main job is making furniture like cots, tables, chairs, benches, and wardrobes. He makes them in his small carpentry workshop with stationary motors that he has, given that there is no electricity in their area. He works hard to support his children who are studying so that they can continue their secondary education and have a better life. He is asking for a loan to buy a stationary motor, a wood shaper, and gas so that he can build the furniture. This way, he can increase his income which will help them cover the cost of their children's education.

loans.use: to buy a stationary motor for carpentry, a wood shaper, and diesel.

loans.name: Gila

texts.en:
Gila is 47 years old and a married woman, who has four children. She is an IDP and lives in Bilasuvar IDP Settlement. Gila has been breeding cattle and cows for the past 10 years. She was a housewife, but her husband is unemployed, and her business helps to cover family needs. 

Gila usually buys small calves, raises and fattens them for 5-6 months, and then resells them for a profitable price in the livestock bazaar. Her monthly income is 90 AZN, and this business is the only source of financial income in her family. Meat is in very high demand in Azerbaijan, and people use it in everyday dishes, like pilau and dolma. Gila also keeps milking cows for personal use and for selling milk to neighbors. 
 
She wants to expand her business and improve the life conditions of her family. She applied for a loan of 1,500 AZN. She plans to purchase two calves, one milking cow, and fodder, with her loan funds. This will be her third loan, and she has a good credit history.

loans.use: to buy two calves, one milking cow and fodder

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a married client, from Iraq. He is 57 years old and has three children. Both Ali and his wife provide the income of the family together. Ali owns a small shop and specializes in selling shoes. He gained his experience while previously working at a wholeseller when he was young. Then, in 2000 he established his own business and began selling men's and women's shoes. He gained good experience in what he practices, and he has gained an excellent reputation in his surroundings.

Ali is requesting a loan of 3,000 USD. He will use this loan to renovate his shop by installing new shelves and new flooring, and repainting the shop. Ali is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits, so that he may be able to provide the school fees for his children.

loans.use: to renovate his shop by installing new shelves and new flooring, and repainting the shop

loans.name: Juliana Virginia

texts.es:
La Señora Juliana vive en La Libertad, ella tiene 45 años de edad.  Ella decidió dedicarse a esta labor parque su esposo sabe realizar muchas cosas en madera y fue una buena oportunidad para trabajar juntos y conseguir dinero.

Ella trabaja en la elaboración y venta de muebles todos los días, con la ayuda de su esposo (en la foto aparecen los dos). La única dificultad que a ella se le presenta en su negocio es la enfermedad que aveces le impide realizar su trabajo con normalidad.  La clienta está casada, su conyugue es ebanista y chofer.Tiene 5 hijos ya casados, cada quien tiene su respectiva familia. 

Ella usara el préstamo para comprar madera para la elaboración de muebles. Ella desea tener el capital para agrandar su negocio para de esta manera cubrir con la elaboración de sus obras, ella desea mejorar su vida económica y familiar.
texts.en:
Sra. Juliana is 45 years old and lives in La Libertad. She decided to engage this type of work because her husband is very knowledgeable about woodworking. This would be a good opportunity for them to work together and earn money.

With the help of her husband, Juliana makes and sells furniture every day (both of them appear in the photo). The only difficulty she faces in her business is dealing with sickness on an occasional basis, which prevents her from doing her normal work. Juliana is married. Her husband is a furniture maker and a chauffeur. They have five children who are married and have their own families.

Juliana will use this loan to buy wood for making furniture. She wants to have capital for expanding her business and covering the cost of making her products. Juliana wants to improve her family’s life and their finances.

loans.use: to buy wood for making furniture.

loans.name: Tashkilat

texts.en:
Tashkilat is 52 years old, married and has four children. He is an IDP (internally displaced person) and lives in Bilasuvar IDP Settlement.

For the past ten years Tashkilat has bred cattle and cows. Beef is in very high demand in Azerbaijan, and people use it in everyday dishes like pilau and dolmas. He usually buys calves, raises and fattens them for five to six months, then sells them at a profit at the local livestock bazaar. He also keeps milk cows for his family’s use and for making milk products such as yogurt to sell to his neighbors.

Tashkilat's livestock provides a monthly income of 120 AZN and is his family’s main source of income. He also receives a pension, but this and his earnings are still too low to cover his family’s needs.

Tashkilat is applying for a 1500 AZN loan through AqroInvest CU to buy one milk cow, three head of cattle and some fodder. This will be his fourth loan, and he has a good client history. He wants to improve his business and his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy one milk cow, three head of cattle and some fodder.

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es: El señor Gregorio tiene 57 años,  es una persona humilde y trabajador, curso hasta la primaria, no pudo concluir el bachillerato por problemas económicos, viéndose en la necesidad de buscar trabajo desde muy joven y por tanto dejar de lado los estudios; de estado civil separado, tiene 5 hijos de los cuales 2 dependen aun del apoyo moral y económico, ; además se pudo evidenciar  que el señor Gregorio tiene gran experiencia en el rubro de transporte, actualmente desempeña su labor de transportista de escombros, prestando sus servicios a personas particulares con las cuales trabaja y ya es conocido por ellos, es así que lleva en este rubro de transporte por más de 33 años trabajando; anteriormente transportando combustible;  además que hace dos años desempeña la labor de trasportista público de pasajeros con el vehículo que tiene; es así que hoy desea solicitar el crédito para reparar el motor de su vehículo.
texts.en: Gregorio is 57 years old, and is a humble and hardworking person. He studied through primary school and didn't go on to get a bachelor degree due to economic problems. Seeing that he was in need of work from a young age, he largely left his studies aside. He is separated and has five children, two of whom depend on him for moral and economic support. Furthermore, it can be shown that he has great experience in the transportation field. He performs work as a materials transporter, offering his services to particular people with whom he works and is well known. He has been working in transportation like this for more than 33 years. First he transported combustibles, and for the past twelve years he has also performed public transportation for passengers in the vehicle he has. For this reason he wants to ask for a loan to repair his motor vehicle.

loans.use: repair his motor vehicle

loans.name: Jonard

texts.en:
Jonard is a fisherman from the town of Ubay, Bohol. He is a married man and has been in the fishing business for several years now. This is the source of his income. Jonard is asking for a loan to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and rope. With this, he will be able to improve his catch thus allowing him to sell more fish in the market.

Jonard hopes to improve his business and augment his income so that he can provide for the needs of the family.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and rope.

loans.name: Haydar

texts.en:
Haydar is a 27-year-old youth client from Iraq, who is married and has three children. Haydar provides his family’s income all by himself while his wife takes care of their children. 

Haydar is a mechanic. He has been in this field since his childhood and has been helping his father in this same garage. After growing up and gaining all the experience needed, Haydar inherited his father’s business and took over the garage in 2002. Now Haydar has gained an excellent reputation thanks to his fast work and competitive prices.

Haydar is requesting a youth loan of 3,000 USD in order to pay the annual rent of the garage and to buy specialized equipment for his work. Haydar is aiming to grow his business and increase its profits so that he will be able to educate his children and provide for all of their needs.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent of the garage and to buy specialized equipment for his work.

loans.name: Cresencia

texts.en:
Cresencia is 47 years old, married with four children. She lives in Bonifacio, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a retail business in the local community to earn a living. She has been in her business for over seven years and earns 15,000 PHP every month. 

She joined in GDMPC in the year 2010, and now she has requested a loan of 20,000 PHP to purchase additional products to sell such as canned goods, noodles, eggs and dried fish. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell such as canned goods, noodles, eggs and dried fish.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more home products to sell.

loans.name: Joan

texts.en:
Joan, 31 years old, is married to a bus driver and blessed with two children. She has managed a piggery business for almost three years. In this business she earns a net income of PHP 3,000 per hog. 

She would like to avail herself of a loan amounting to PHP 15,000 to purchase hog feed for her hogs. She's hoping that her loan will be granted so that she will be able to improve further her business to gain more income.

loans.use: To purchase hog feed for her hogs.

loans.name: Vladimir

texts.es: El señor Vladimir tiene 37 años, es soltero, no tiene hijos y está viviendo en la zona de el plan 3000, el vive en la casa de su tía en alquiler ya que no cuenta con casa propia.
